1552 /*
1553  * tz_utc_datetimetz_to_local () -
1554  *
1555  * Return: error code
1556  * dt_utc(in): object containing datetime value (in UTC reference)
1557  * tz_id(in): TZ_ID encoded value
1558  * dt_local(out): object containing datetime value (adjusted to timezone contained in tz_id)
1559  *
1560  */
1561 int
1562 tz_utc_datetimetz_to_local (const DB_DATETIME * dt_utc, const TZ_ID * tz_id, DB_DATETIME * dt_local)
1563 {
1564  int total_offset;
1565  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
1566  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
1567 
1568  tz_decode_tz_id (tz_id, true, &tz_info);
1569 
1570  if (tz_info.type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
1571  {
1572  total_offset = tz_info.offset;
1573  if (total_offset == TZ_INVALID_OFFSET)
1574  {
1575 #if !defined (CS_MODE)
1576  assert (BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ());
1577 #endif
1578  err_status = ER_TZ_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1579  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
1580  }
1581  }
1582  else
1583  {
1584  assert (tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule != NULL);
1585  total_offset = tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->gmt_off;
1586 
1587  if (tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID && tz_info.zone.p_ds_rule != NULL)
1588  {
1589  total_offset += tz_info.zone.p_ds_rule->save_time;
1590  }
1591  if (tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_FIXED)
1592  {
1593  total_offset += tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->ds_ruleset;
1594  }
1595  }
1596 
1597  if (dt_utc->date == 0)
1598  {
1599  assert (dt_utc->time == 0);
1600  *dt_local = *dt_utc;
1601  }
1602  else
1603  {
1604  err_status = db_add_int_to_datetime ((DB_DATETIME *) dt_utc, total_offset * 1000, dt_local);
1605  }
1606 
1607  return err_status;
1608 }
1609 
1610 /*
1611  * tz_datetimeltz_to_local () -
1612  *
1613  * Return: error code
1614  * dt_ltz(in): object containing datetime value in UTC representing a datetime in local timezone
1615  * dt_local(out): object containing datetime value (adjusted to session timezone)
1616  *
1617  */
1618 int
1619 tz_datetimeltz_to_local (const DB_DATETIME * dt_ltz, DB_DATETIME * dt_local)
1620 {
1621  int error = NO_ERROR;
1622  TZ_ID ses_tz_id;
1623 
1624  error = tz_create_session_tzid_for_datetime (dt_ltz, true, &ses_tz_id);
1625  if (error != NO_ERROR)
1626  {
1627  return error;
1628  }
1629 
1630  return tz_utc_datetimetz_to_local (dt_ltz, &ses_tz_id, dt_local);
1631 }
1632 
1633 /*
1634  * tz_zone_info_to_str () - Print a timezone decoded information into a string
1635  *
1636  * Return: print characters
1637  * tz_info(in): object containing timezone info
1638  * tz_str(in/out): buffer string to print in
1639  * tz_str_size(in): size of buffer
1640  *
1641  */
1642 static int
1643 tz_zone_info_to_str (const TZ_DECODE_INFO * tz_info, char *tz_str, const int tz_str_size)
1644 {
1645  const TZ_DATA *tzd = tz_get_data ();
1646  int zone_name_size;
1647  int zone_id;
1648  int zone_offset_id;
1649  int dst_format_size;
1650  int total_len;
1651  TZ_TIMEZONE *timezone;
1652  TZ_OFFSET_RULE *zone_off_rule;
1653  char dst_format[TZ_MAX_FORMAT_SIZE];
1654  const char *p_dst_format = NULL;
1655 
1656  if (tz_info->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
1657  {
1658  int offset = tz_info->offset;
1659  int hour, min, sec, n;
1660  char sign;
1661 
1662  if (offset == TZ_INVALID_OFFSET)
1663  {
1664  return -1;
1665  }
1666 
1667  sign = (offset < 0) ? '-' : '+';
1668  assert (offset >= TZ_MIN_OFFSET && offset <= TZ_MAX_OFFSET);
1669 
1670  offset = (offset < 0) ? (-offset) : offset;
1671  db_time_decode ((DB_TIME *) (&offset), &hour, &min, &sec);
1672 
1673  if (sec > 0)
1674  {
1675  n = sprintf (tz_str, "%c%02d:%02d:%02d", sign, hour, min, sec);
1676  }
1677  else
1678  {
1679  n = sprintf (tz_str, "%c%02d:%02d", sign, hour, min);
1680  }
1681 
1682  return n;
1683  }
1684 
1685  if (tzd == NULL)
1686  {
1687  return -1;
1688  }
1689 
1690  zone_id = tz_info->zone.zone_id;
1691  zone_offset_id = tz_info->zone.offset_id;
1692  zone_name_size = strlen (tzd->names[zone_id].name);
1693 
1694  timezone = &(tzd->timezones[tzd->names[zone_id].zone_id]);
1695  zone_off_rule = &(tzd->offset_rules[timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + zone_offset_id]);
1696 
1697  p_dst_format = zone_off_rule->std_format;
1698  if (zone_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID)
1699  {
1700  TZ_DS_RULESET *ds_ruleset;
1701  TZ_DS_RULE *ds_rule = NULL;
1702  int dst_id = tz_info->zone.dst_id;
1703  const char *ds_abbr = NULL;
1704 
1705  ds_ruleset = &(tzd->ds_rulesets[zone_off_rule->ds_ruleset]);
1706  if (dst_id < ds_ruleset->count)
1707  {
1708  ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[dst_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
1709  ds_abbr = ds_rule->letter_abbrev;
1710  }
1711 
1712  if (zone_off_rule->var_format != NULL)
1713  {
1714  if (ds_abbr == NULL)
1715  {
1716  p_dst_format = NULL;
1717  }
1718  else
1719  {
1720  snprintf (dst_format, sizeof (dst_format) - 1, zone_off_rule->var_format,
1721  (ds_abbr != NULL && *ds_abbr != '-') ? ds_abbr : "");
1722  p_dst_format = dst_format;
1723  }
1724  }
1725  else
1726  {
1727  if (ds_rule != NULL && ds_rule->save_time != 0 && zone_off_rule->save_format != NULL)
1728  {
1729  p_dst_format = zone_off_rule->save_format;
1730  }
1731  }
1732  }
1733 
1734  if (p_dst_format != NULL)
1735  {
1736  dst_format_size = strlen (p_dst_format);
1737  }
1738  else
1739  {
1740  dst_format_size = 0;
1741  }
1742 
1743  if (dst_format_size > 0)
1744  {
1745  total_len = dst_format_size + zone_name_size + 2;
1746  }
1747  else
1748  {
1749  total_len = zone_name_size + 1;
1750  }
1751 
1752  if (total_len > tz_str_size)
1753  {
1754  /* silent return */
1755  return -1;
1756  }
1757 
1758  if (p_dst_format != NULL)
1759  {
1760  snprintf (tz_str, tz_str_size, "%s %s", tzd->names[zone_id].name, p_dst_format);
1761  }
1762  else
1763  {
1764  snprintf (tz_str, tz_str_size, "%s", tzd->names[zone_id].name);
1765  }
1766 
1767  return total_len - 1;
1768 }
1769 
1770 /*
1771  * tz_id_to_str () - Print a timezone compressed identifier into a string
1772  *
1773  * Return: printed characters
1774  * tz_id(in): complete valid zone identifier
1775  * tz_str(in): buffer string to print in
1776  * tz_str_size(in): size of buffer
1777  *
1778  */
1779 int
1780 tz_id_to_str (const TZ_ID * tz_id, char *tz_str, const int tz_str_size)
1781 {
1782  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
1783 
1784  tz_decode_tz_id (tz_id, true, &tz_info);
1785  return tz_zone_info_to_str (&tz_info, tz_str, tz_str_size);
1786 }
1787 
1788 /*
1789  * tz_datetimetz_fix_zone () - Adjusts timezone identifier part of a DATETIMETZ object so that offset and DST parts
1790  * are adjusted to new DATETIME
1791  *
1792  * Return: error code
1793  * src_dt_tz(in): datetime value (adjusted to UTC) and timezone identifier
1794  * dest_dt_tz(out): fixed DATETIMETZ value
1795  *
1796  * Note : After an arithmetic operation (DATETIMETZ + number), the DATETIME
1797  * part is changed, but the TZ_ID part remains unchanged and is not
1798  * compatible. This functions adjusts the TZ_ID. If the TZ_ID is of
1799  * offset type, no adjustements are necessary. If TZ_ID is of
1800  * geographic type, only the zone idenfier is kept, while the offset
1801  * and daylight saving rule identifiers are changed according to new
1802  * date. This ensures that the output value is ready to be decoded.
1803  *
1804  */
1805 int
1806 tz_datetimetz_fix_zone (const DB_DATETIMETZ * src_dt_tz, DB_DATETIMETZ * dest_dt_tz)
1807 {
1808  int er_status = NO_ERROR;
1809  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
1810 
1811  tz_decode_tz_id (&(src_dt_tz->tz_id), false, &tz_info);
1812 
1813  er_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&(src_dt_tz->datetime), &tz_info, true, true, &(dest_dt_tz->datetime));
1814  if (er_status != NO_ERROR)
1815  {
1816  return er_status;
1817  }
1818 
1819  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(dest_dt_tz->tz_id));
1820 
1821  return er_status;
1822 }
1823 
1824 /*
1825  * tz_timestamptz_fix_zone () - Adjusts timezone identifier part of a DATETIMETZ object so that offset and DST parts
1826  * are adjusted to new DATETIME
1827  *
1828  * Return: error code
1829  * src_ts_tz(in): timestamp value and timezone identifier
1830  * dest_ts_tz(out): fixed TIMESTAMPTZ value
1831  *
1832  */
1833 int
1834 tz_timestamptz_fix_zone (const DB_TIMESTAMPTZ * src_ts_tz, DB_TIMESTAMPTZ * dest_ts_tz)
1835 {
1836  int er_status = NO_ERROR;
1837  DB_DATETIMETZ src_dt_tz, dest_dt_tz;
1838  DB_DATE date;
1839  DB_TIME time;
1840 
1841  db_timestamp_decode_utc (&src_ts_tz->timestamp, &date, &time);
1842  src_dt_tz.datetime.date = date;
1843  src_dt_tz.datetime.time = time * 1000;
1844  src_dt_tz.tz_id = src_ts_tz->tz_id;
1845 
1846  er_status = tz_datetimetz_fix_zone (&src_dt_tz, &dest_dt_tz);
1847  if (er_status != NO_ERROR)
1848  {
1849  return er_status;
1850  }
1851 
1852  date = dest_dt_tz.datetime.date;
1853  time = dest_dt_tz.datetime.time / 1000;
1854 
1855  dest_ts_tz->tz_id = dest_dt_tz.tz_id;
1856  er_status = db_timestamp_encode_utc (&date, &time, &dest_ts_tz->timestamp);
1857 
1858  return er_status;
1859 }
1860 
1861 /*
1862  * Utility functions
1863  */
1864 
1865 /*
1866  * tz_encode_tz_id () - Encodes a timezone decoded information into a compressed timezone identifier (ready for storage)
1867  *
1868  * Return: none
1869  * tz_info(in): object containing decoded timezone info
1870  * tz_id(out): compressed timezone identifier
1871  *
1872  * FFZZZZZZ ZZZZZZZZ OOOOOOOO DDDDDDDD
1873  * F = 01 : TZ_ID is number representing positive offset in seconds
1874  * F = 10 : TZ_ID is number representing negative offset in seconds
1875  * F = 00 : TZ_ID is encoded as ZOD
1876  * F = 11 : not used
1877  * Z = geographical zone id
1878  * O = GMT offset sub-rule id
1879  * D = DST sub-rule id
1880  */
1881 static void
1882 tz_encode_tz_id (const TZ_DECODE_INFO * tz_info, TZ_ID * tz_id)
1883 {
1884  if (tz_info->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
1885  {
1886  int offset = (tz_info->offset < 0) ? (-tz_info->offset) : tz_info->offset;
1887 
1888  offset = offset & TZ_OFFSET_MASK;
1889 
1890  if (tz_info->offset < 0)
1891  {
1892  *tz_id = offset | (0x2 << 30);
1893  }
1894  else
1895  {
1896  *tz_id = offset | (0x1 << 30);
1897  }
1898  }
1899  else
1900  {
1901  int zone_id = tz_info->zone.zone_id;
1902  int offset_id = tz_info->zone.offset_id;
1903  int dst_id = tz_info->zone.dst_id;
1904 
1905  zone_id = zone_id & TZ_ZONE_ID_MAX;
1906  offset_id = offset_id & TZ_OFFSET_ID_MAX;
1907  dst_id = dst_id & TZ_DS_ID_MAX;
1908 
1909  *tz_id = dst_id | (offset_id << 8) | (zone_id) << 16;
1910  }
1911 }
1912 
1913 /*
1914  * tz_encode_tz_region () - encodes a partial timezone decoding struct into a timezone region
1915  *
1916  * Return: none
1917  * tz_info(in): object containing decoded timezone info
1918  * tz_region(out): time zone region
1919  */
1920 static void
1921 tz_encode_tz_region (const TZ_DECODE_INFO * tz_info, TZ_REGION * tz_region)
1922 {
1923  tz_region->type = tz_info->type;
1924  if (tz_info->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
1925  {
1926  tz_region->offset = tz_info->offset;
1927  }
1928  else
1929  {
1930  assert (tz_info->zone.zone_id < TZ_ZONE_ID_MAX);
1931  tz_region->zone_id = tz_info->zone.zone_id;
1932  }
1933 }
1934 
1935 /*
1936  * tz_decode_tz_id () - Decodes a timezone compressed identifier into a structure
1937  *
1938  * Return: none
1939  * tz_id(in): full
1940  * is_full_decode(in): true if full decoding should be performed; otherwise
1941  * only zone identifier is decoded for a geographical TZ_ID
1942  * tz_info(out): object containing decoded timezone info
1943  *
1944  */
1945 static void
1946 tz_decode_tz_id (const TZ_ID * tz_id, const bool is_full_decode, TZ_DECODE_INFO * tz_info)
1947 {
1948  unsigned int val = (unsigned int) *tz_id;
1949  unsigned int flag = (val & TZ_MASK_TZ_ID_FLAG) >> TZ_BIT_SHIFT_TZ_ID_FLAG;
1950 
1951  memset (tz_info, 0, sizeof (tz_info[0]));
1952 
1953  if (flag == 0)
1954  {
1955  tz_info->zone.zone_id = (val & (TZ_ZONE_ID_MAX << 16)) >> 16;
1956  tz_info->zone.offset_id = (val & (TZ_OFFSET_ID_MAX << 8)) >> 8;
1957  tz_info->zone.dst_id = val & TZ_DS_ID_MAX;
1958  tz_info->type = TZ_REGION_ZONE;
1959 
1960  assert (tz_info->zone.zone_id < TZ_ZONE_ID_MAX);
1961 
1962  if (is_full_decode)
1963  {
1964  int zone_id;
1965  int zone_offset_id;
1966  const TZ_DATA *tzd = tz_get_data ();
1967  TZ_TIMEZONE *timezone;
1968  TZ_OFFSET_RULE *zone_off_rule;
1969 
1970  if (tzd == NULL)
1971  {
1972  tz_info->type = TZ_REGION_OFFSET;
1973  tz_info->offset = 0;
1974  return;
1975  }
1976 
1977  zone_id = tzd->names[tz_info->zone.zone_id].zone_id;
1978  zone_offset_id = tz_info->zone.offset_id;
1979 
1980  assert (zone_offset_id >= 0 && zone_offset_id < TZ_OFFSET_ID_MAX);
1981 
1982  timezone = &(tzd->timezones[zone_id]);
1983  tz_info->zone.p_timezone = timezone;
1984 
1985  zone_off_rule = &(tzd->offset_rules[timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + zone_offset_id]);
1986  tz_info->zone.p_zone_off_rule = zone_off_rule;
1987 
1988  if (zone_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID)
1989  {
1990  TZ_DS_RULESET *ds_ruleset;
1991  TZ_DS_RULE *ds_rule;
1992  int dst_id;
1993  const char *ds_abbr = NULL;
1994 
1995  ds_ruleset = &(tzd->ds_rulesets[zone_off_rule->ds_ruleset]);
1996  dst_id = tz_info->zone.dst_id;
1997 
1998  /* we may not have a DST rule, if Daylight Saving does not apply */
1999  if (dst_id != TZ_DS_ID_MAX)
2000  {
2001  assert (dst_id >= 0 && dst_id < ds_ruleset->count);
2002  ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[dst_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
2003  ds_abbr = ds_rule->letter_abbrev;
2004 
2005  tz_info->zone.p_ds_rule = ds_rule;
2006 
2007  if (zone_off_rule->var_format != NULL)
2008  {
2009  snprintf (tz_info->zone.dst_str, sizeof (tz_info->zone.dst_str) - 1, zone_off_rule->var_format,
2010  (ds_abbr != NULL && *ds_abbr != '-') ? ds_abbr : "");
2011  }
2012  }
2013  }
2014  }
2015  }
2016  else
2017  {
2018  tz_info->type = TZ_REGION_OFFSET;
2019  if (flag == 0x2)
2020  {
2021  /* negative offset */
2022  tz_info->offset = -(int) (val & TZ_OFFSET_MASK);
2023  }
2024  else
2025  {
2026  /* positive offset */
2027  assert (flag == 0x1);
2028  tz_info->offset = val & TZ_OFFSET_MASK;
2029  }
2030  }
2031 }
2032 
2033 /*
2034  * tz_decode_tz_region () - Decodes a timezone region structure into a helper timezone decoder structure
2035  *
2036  * Return: none
2037  * tz_region(in): time zone region
2038  * tz_info(out): object containing partial decoded timezone info
2039  *
2040  */
2041 static void
2042 tz_decode_tz_region (const TZ_REGION * tz_region, TZ_DECODE_INFO * tz_info)
2043 {
2044  tz_info->type = tz_region->type;
2045 
2046  if (tz_region->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
2047  {
2048  tz_info->offset = tz_region->offset;
2049  }
2050  else
2051  {
2052  tz_info->zone.zone_id = tz_region->zone_id;
2053  }
2054 
2055  tz_info->zone.offset_id = TZ_OFFSET_ID_MAX;
2056  tz_info->zone.dst_id = TZ_DS_ID_MAX;
2057  tz_info->zone.p_timezone = NULL;
2058  tz_info->zone.p_zone_off_rule = NULL;
2059  tz_info->zone.p_ds_rule = NULL;
2060  tz_info->zone.dst_str[0] = '\0';
2061 }
2062 
2063 /*
2064  * tz_get_first_weekday_around_date () - find the day of month when a specific weekday occurs
2065  * Returns: -1 if error; otherwise, day of month (0 to 27/28/29/30, depending on the input month.
2066  *
2067  * year(in):
2068  * month(in): month (0-11)
2069  * weekday(in): weekday ( 0 = Sunday through 6 = Saturday)
2070  * ref_day(in): reference day of month (0 based)
2071  *
2072  */
2073 int
2074 tz_get_first_weekday_around_date (const int year, const int month, const int weekday, const int ref_day,
2075  const bool before)
2076 {
2077  int first_weekday = -1;
2078  int wday = -1;
2079 
2080  assert (year >= 1900);
2081 
2082  wday = db_get_day_of_week (year, month + 1, ref_day + 1);
2083  first_weekday = ref_day;
2084 
2085  while (wday != weekday)
2086  {
2087  if (before == true)
2088  {
2089  wday = (wday == TZ_WEEK_DAY_SUN) ? TZ_WEEK_DAY_SAT : (wday - 1);
2090  first_weekday--;
2091  assert (first_weekday >= 0);
2092  }
2093  else
2094  {
2095  wday = (wday + 1) % TZ_WEEK_DAY_COUNT;
2096  first_weekday++;
2097 
2098  assert (first_weekday <
2099  ((month == TZ_MON_FEB) ? (((IS_LEAP_YEAR (year)) ? 29 : 28)) : DAYS_IN_MONTH (month)));
2100  }
2101  }
2102 
2103  return first_weekday;
2104 }
2105 
2106 /*
2107  * tz_str_read_number() - attempts to read an integer value from a string
2108  *
2109  * Returns: error code
2110  * str(in): string to parse
2111  * str_end(in): pointer to end of string (after last character)
2112  * strict(in): true, if no trailing characters allowed
2113  * read_sign(in): true, if shoud read leading sign
2114  * val(out): the integer found in the input string
2115  * str_next(out): reference to the first character after the read integer.
2116  * If no value was read, str_next will reference str.
2117  */
2118 int
2119 tz_str_read_number (const char *str, const char *str_end, const bool strict, const bool read_sign, int *val,
2120  const char **str_next)
2121 {
2122  int cur_val = 0;
2123  const char *str_cursor;
2124  bool is_negative = false;
2125 
2126  assert (str < str_end && !IS_EMPTY_STR (str));
2127 
2128  str_cursor = str;
2129 
2130  if (read_sign == true && str < str_end)
2131  {
2132  if (*str_cursor == '-')
2133  {
2134  is_negative = true;
2135  str_cursor++;
2136  }
2137  else if (*str_cursor == '+')
2138  {
2139  str_cursor++;
2140  }
2141  }
2142 
2143  while (str_cursor < str_end && char_isdigit (*str_cursor))
2144  {
2145  cur_val = cur_val * 10 + (*str_cursor - '0');
2146  str_cursor++;
2147  }
2148 
2149  *val = is_negative ? -cur_val : cur_val;
2150 
2151  *str_next = (char *) str_cursor;
2152 
2153  if (strict && str_cursor == str)
2154  {
2155  return ER_FAILED;
2156  }
2157 
2158  return NO_ERROR;
2159 }
2160 
2161 /*
2162  * tz_str_read_time() - read a time value from an input string. Input time can be hh, hh:mm or hh:mm:ss (s or u)
2163  *
2164  * Returns: ER_FAILED (message error is not set) or NO_ERROR
2165  * str(in): string to parse
2166  * str_end(in): end of string (pointer to first character after string)
2167  * need_minutes(in): true if it is mandatory to read minutes part, otherwise hour specifier is enough
2168  * allow_sec60(in): true if 60 is allowed for the value of seconds, false otherwise
2169  * hour(out): parsed value for hour
2170  * min(out) : parsed value for minutes
2171  * sec(out) : parsed value for seconds
2172  * str_next(out): pointer to the char after the parsed time value
2173  */
2174 int
2175 tz_str_read_time (const char *str, const char *str_end, bool need_minutes, bool allow_sec60, int *hour, int *min,
2176  int *sec, const char **str_next)
2177 {
2178  const char *str_cursor;
2179  int val_read = 0;
2180 
2181  assert (str < str_end && !IS_EMPTY_STR (str));
2182 
2183  *hour = *min = *sec = 0;
2184  str_cursor = str;
2185 
2186  /* read hour part */
2187  if (tz_str_read_number (str_cursor, str_end, true, false, &val_read, str_next) != NO_ERROR)
2188  {
2189  return ER_FAILED;
2190  }
2191  if (val_read < 0 || val_read > 24)
2192  {
2193  return ER_FAILED;
2194  }
2195  *hour = val_read;
2196 
2197  str_cursor = *str_next;
2198  if (*str_cursor != ':')
2199  {
2200  if (!need_minutes && *str_cursor == '\0')
2201  {
2202  return NO_ERROR;
2203  }
2204  /* invalid text representation for time */
2205  return ER_FAILED;
2206  }
2207 
2208  str_cursor++; /* skip colon between hour and minute part */
2209 
2210  /* read minute part */
2211  if (str_cursor >= str_end || IS_EMPTY_STR (str_cursor))
2212  {
2213  /* missing minute token */
2214  return ER_FAILED;
2215  }
2216  if (tz_str_read_number (str_cursor, str_end, true, false, &val_read, str_next) != NO_ERROR)
2217  {
2218  return ER_FAILED;
2219  }
2220  if (val_read < 0 || val_read > 60 || (val_read > 0 && *hour == 24))
2221  {
2222  return ER_FAILED;
2223  }
2224  *min = val_read;
2225 
2226  /* read second part if exists */
2227  str_cursor = *str_next;
2228 
2229  assert (str_cursor <= str_end);
2230  if (str_cursor == str_end)
2231  {
2232  /* reaches end of the given string. This means it does not have second part */
2233  assert (*sec == 0);
2234  return NO_ERROR;
2235  }
2236 
2237  assert (str_cursor < str_end);
2238  if (*str_cursor == ':')
2239  {
2240  /* if there is a token for seconds, read it */
2241  str_cursor++;
2242  if (tz_str_read_number (str_cursor, str_end, true, false, &val_read, str_next) != NO_ERROR)
2243  {
2244  return ER_FAILED;
2245  }
2246  if (val_read < 0 || val_read > (allow_sec60 ? 61 : 60))
2247  {
2248  return ER_FAILED;
2249  }
2250  *sec = val_read;
2251  }
2252 
2253  return NO_ERROR;
2254 }
2255 
2256 /*
2257  * tz_str_to_seconds() - parses a string representing a signed time offset
2258  *
2259  * Returns: ER_FAILED (message error is not set) or NO_ERROR
2260  * str(in): string to parse
2261  * seconds(out): the signed number of seconds that the string represents
2262  * str_next(out): pointer to the first char after the parsed time
2263  * is_offset(in): true if str is a timezone offset, false if it is
2264  * an absolute value
2265  */
2266 int
2267 tz_str_to_seconds (const char *str, const char *str_end, int *seconds, const char **str_next, const bool is_offset)
2268 {
2269  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
2270  int result = 0;
2271  const char *str_cursor = NULL;
2272  int hour = 0, min = 0, sec = 0;
2273  bool is_negative = false;
2274 
2275  assert (str != NULL);
2276 
2277  str_cursor = str;
2278  if (str_cursor < str_end && *str_cursor == '-')
2279  {
2280  is_negative = true;
2281  str_cursor++;
2282  }
2283  if (str_cursor < str_end && *str_cursor == '+')
2284  {
2285  str_cursor++;
2286  }
2287 
2288  err_status = tz_str_read_time (str_cursor, str_end, false, false, &hour, &min, &sec, str_next);
2289  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
2290  {
2291  return err_status;
2292  }
2293  if (is_offset == true)
2294  {
2295  if (is_negative == true && -(hour * 3600 + min * 60 + sec) < TZ_MIN_OFFSET)
2296  {
2297  return ER_FAILED;
2298  }
2299  if (is_negative == false && (hour * 3600 + min * 60 + sec) > TZ_MAX_OFFSET)
2300  {
2301  return ER_FAILED;
2302  }
2303  }
2304 
2305  result = sec + min * 60 + hour * 3600;
2306 
2307  *seconds = is_negative ? -result : result;
2308  return err_status;
2309 }
2310 
2311 /*
2312  * tz_get_ds_change_julian_date () - Computes the exact date when a daylight saving rule applies in year and
2313  * the difference between the src_julian_date and the computed date
2314  * Returns: error code
2315  * src_julian_date(in): source julian date
2316  * ds_rule(in): daylight saving rule
2317  * year(in): current year to apply rule
2318  * ds_rule_julian_date(out): julian date
2319  * date_diff(out): date difference between the two dates
2320  */
2321 int
2322 tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (const int src_julian_date, const TZ_DS_RULE * ds_rule, const int year,
2323  int *ds_rule_julian_date, full_date_t * date_diff)
2324 {
2325  int ds_rule_day;
2326  int ds_rule_month = ds_rule->in_month;
2327 
2328  /* get exact julian date/time for this rule in year 'local_year' */
2329  if (ds_rule->change_on.type == TZ_DS_TYPE_FIXED)
2330  {
2331  ds_rule_day = ds_rule->change_on.day_of_month;
2332  }
2333  else
2334  {
2335  int ds_rule_weekday, day_month_bound;
2336  bool before = (ds_rule->change_on.type == TZ_DS_TYPE_VAR_SMALLER) ? true : false;
2337  ds_rule_weekday = ds_rule->change_on.day_of_week;
2338  day_month_bound = ds_rule->change_on.day_of_month;
2339 
2340  if (ds_rule->change_on.type == TZ_DS_TYPE_VAR_SMALLER && ds_rule_month == TZ_MON_FEB && IS_LEAP_YEAR (year)
2341  && day_month_bound == 27)
2342  {
2343  day_month_bound++;
2344  }
2345 
2346  ds_rule_day = tz_get_first_weekday_around_date (year, ds_rule_month, ds_rule_weekday, day_month_bound, before);
2347 
2348  if (ds_rule_day == -1)
2349  {
2350  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_TZ_INTERNAL_ERROR, 0);
2351  return ER_TZ_INTERNAL_ERROR;
2352  }
2353  }
2354 
2355  *ds_rule_julian_date = julian_encode (1 + ds_rule_month, 1 + ds_rule_day, year);
2356 
2357  if (date_diff != NULL)
2358  {
2359  *date_diff = FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, 0) - FULL_DATE (*ds_rule_julian_date, 0);
2360  }
2361 
2362  return NO_ERROR;
2363 }
2364 
2365 /*
2366  * tz_fast_find_ds_rule () - Performs a search to find the daylight saving rule for which a certain date applies to
2367  *
2368  * Returns: error code
2369  * tzd(in): Daylight saving data context
2370  * ds_ruleset(in): set of daylight saving rules
2371  * src_julian_date(in): julian date for which we search a rule
2372  * src_year(in): year of date
2373  * src_month(in): month of date
2374  * ds_rule_id(out): found rule
2375  */
2376 static int
2377 tz_fast_find_ds_rule (const TZ_DATA * tzd, const TZ_DS_RULESET * ds_ruleset, const int src_julian_date,
2378  const int src_year, const int src_month, int *ds_rule_id)
2379 {
2380  int curr_ds_id;
2381  int er_status = NO_ERROR;
2382  TZ_DS_RULE *curr_ds_rule;
2383  full_date_t smallest_date_diff = -1;
2384  int year_to_apply_rule = 0;
2385  full_date_t second_best_date_diff = -1;
2386  int second_best_ds_id = -1;
2387 
2388  *ds_rule_id = -1;
2389 
2390  if ((src_year > ds_ruleset->to_year_max && src_month > TZ_MON_JAN) || (src_year > ds_ruleset->to_year_max + 1))
2391  {
2392  goto exit;
2393  }
2394 
2395  for (curr_ds_id = 0; curr_ds_id < ds_ruleset->count; curr_ds_id++)
2396  {
2397  int ds_rule_julian_date;
2398  full_date_t date_diff;
2399 
2400  assert (curr_ds_id + ds_ruleset->index_start < tzd->ds_rule_count);
2401  curr_ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[curr_ds_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
2402 
2403  if (src_year + 1 < curr_ds_rule->from_year)
2404  {
2405  /* no more rules will match */
2406  break;
2407  }
2408 
2409  if (src_year - 1 > curr_ds_rule->to_year
2410  || (src_year > ds_ruleset->to_year_max && curr_ds_rule->in_month < TZ_MON_DEC))
2411  {
2412  full_date_t diff;
2413  full_date_t ds_rule_date = 0;
2414 
2415  /* We don't need here the date difference so we use only rule date */
2416  er_status =
2417  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (0, curr_ds_rule, curr_ds_rule->to_year, &ds_rule_julian_date, NULL);
2418  if (er_status != NO_ERROR)
2419  {
2420  goto exit;
2421  }
2422 
2423  ds_rule_date = FULL_DATE (ds_rule_julian_date, curr_ds_rule->at_time);
2424  diff = FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, 0) - ds_rule_date;
2425 
2426  if (second_best_date_diff == -1 || diff < second_best_date_diff)
2427  {
2428  second_best_date_diff = diff;
2429  second_best_ds_id = curr_ds_id;
2430  }
2431 
2432  /* this rule cannot apply */
2433  continue;
2434  }
2435  else if (src_year < curr_ds_rule->from_year && curr_ds_rule->in_month > TZ_MON_JAN)
2436  {
2437  continue;
2438  }
2439 
2440  year_to_apply_rule = get_year_to_apply_rule (src_year, curr_ds_rule);
2441  er_status =
2442  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (src_julian_date, curr_ds_rule, year_to_apply_rule, &ds_rule_julian_date,
2443  &date_diff);
2444  if (er_status != NO_ERROR)
2445  {
2446  goto exit;
2447  }
2448 
2449  if (date_diff < 0 && curr_ds_rule->from_year < year_to_apply_rule)
2450  {
2451  /* if DS rule does not apply to current year try previous year */
2452  er_status =
2453  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (src_julian_date, curr_ds_rule, year_to_apply_rule - 1,
2454  &ds_rule_julian_date, &date_diff);
2455  if (er_status != NO_ERROR)
2456  {
2457  goto exit;
2458  }
2459  }
2460 
2461  if (date_diff >= DATE_DIFF_MATCH_SAFE_THRESHOLD_SEC
2462  && (smallest_date_diff == -1 || date_diff < smallest_date_diff))
2463  {
2464  /* a date difference of at least two days */
2465  *ds_rule_id = curr_ds_id;
2466  smallest_date_diff = date_diff;
2467  }
2468  }
2469  if (*ds_rule_id == -1)
2470  {
2471  *ds_rule_id = second_best_ds_id;
2472  }
2473 
2474 exit:
2475  return er_status;
2476 }
2477 
2478 /*
2479  * tz_check_ds_match_string () - Checks if user supplied daylight saving string specifier matches the DS rule
2480  *
2481  * Returns: true if the DS string matches with the selected offset and DS rule
2482  * off_rule(in): Offset rule
2483  * ds_rule(in): daylight saving rule
2484  * ds_string(in): daylight saving specifier (user source)
2485  * default_abrev(in): default abbreviation in case ds_rule is NULL
2486  */
2487 static bool
2488 tz_check_ds_match_string (const TZ_OFFSET_RULE * off_rule, const TZ_DS_RULE * ds_rule, const char *ds_string,
2489  const char *default_abrev)
2490 {
2491  bool rule_matched = true;
2492  const char *letter_abrev = NULL;
2493 
2494  if (ds_rule != NULL && ds_rule->letter_abbrev != NULL && *ds_rule->letter_abbrev != '-')
2495  {
2496  letter_abrev = ds_rule->letter_abbrev;
2497  }
2498  else if (ds_rule == NULL && *default_abrev != '-')
2499  {
2500  letter_abrev = default_abrev;
2501  }
2502 
2503  if (off_rule->var_format != NULL)
2504  {
2505  char rule_dst_format[TZ_MAX_FORMAT_SIZE];
2506 
2507  if (letter_abrev != NULL)
2508  {
2509  snprintf (rule_dst_format, sizeof (rule_dst_format) - 1, off_rule->var_format, letter_abrev);
2510  }
2511  else
2512  {
2513  snprintf (rule_dst_format, sizeof (rule_dst_format) - 1, off_rule->var_format, "");
2514  }
2515 
2516  if (strcasecmp (rule_dst_format, ds_string) != 0)
2517  {
2518  /* not matching with variable format */
2519  rule_matched = false;
2520  }
2521  }
2522  else if (off_rule->save_format != NULL && ds_rule->save_time != 0
2523  && strcasecmp (off_rule->save_format, ds_string) != 0)
2524  {
2525  /* not matching with DST format */
2526  rule_matched = false;
2527  }
2528  else if (off_rule->std_format != NULL && ds_rule->save_time == 0 && strcasecmp (off_rule->std_format, ds_string) != 0)
2529  {
2530  /* not matching with standard format */
2531  rule_matched = false;
2532  }
2533 
2534  return rule_matched;
2535 }
2536 
2537 /*
2538  * tz_offset_with_fixed_ds () - Returns an offset that will be used to transform a date into either UTC time reference
2539  * or local time reference
2540  *
2541  * Returns: an offset
2542  * src_is_utc(in): true if UTC time reference, false otherwise
2543  * until_time_type(in): time type of the offset rule
2544  * gmt_offset_sec(in): gmt offset of the offset rule
2545  * ds_save_time(in): daylight saving time
2546  */
2547 static int
2548 tz_offset (const bool src_is_utc, const TZ_TIME_TYPE until_time_type, const int gmt_offset_sec, const int ds_save_time)
2549 {
2550  int offset = 0;
2551 
2552  if (src_is_utc == true)
2553  {
2554  if (until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
2555  {
2556  offset += gmt_offset_sec;
2557  }
2558  else if (until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_WALL)
2559  {
2560  offset += gmt_offset_sec + ds_save_time;
2561  }
2562  }
2563  else if (src_is_utc == false)
2564  {
2565  if (until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_UTC)
2566  {
2567  offset -= gmt_offset_sec + ds_save_time;
2568  }
2569  else if (until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
2570  {
2571  offset -= ds_save_time;
2572  }
2573  }
2574 
2575  return offset;
2576 }
2577 
2578 /*
2579  * get_date_diff_from_ds_rule () - Returns the date difference between a source date and the date when applying
2580  * a daylight saving rule using from_year or to_year
2581  *
2582  * Returns: error or no error
2583  * src_julian_date(in): input source date
2584  * src_time_sec(in): input source time
2585  * ds_rule(in): input daylight saving rule
2586  * direction(in): flag that tells in which direction to search
2587  * date_diff(out): date difference
2588  */
2589 static int
2590 get_date_diff_from_ds_rule (const int src_julian_date, const int src_time_sec, const TZ_DS_RULE * ds_rule,
2591  const DS_SEARCH_DIRECTION direction, full_date_t * date_diff)
2592 {
2593  int ds_rule_julian_date;
2594  int year, err_status = NO_ERROR;
2595  full_date_t ds_rule_date;
2596 
2597  if (direction == FORWARD)
2598  {
2599  year = ds_rule->from_year;
2600  }
2601  else
2602  {
2603  year = ds_rule->to_year;
2604  }
2605 
2606  /* We don't need here the date difference so we use only rule date */
2607  err_status = tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (0, ds_rule, year, &ds_rule_julian_date, NULL);
2608  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
2609  {
2610  goto exit;
2611  }
2612 
2613  ds_rule_date = FULL_DATE (ds_rule_julian_date, ds_rule->at_time);
2614  *date_diff = FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec) - ds_rule_date;
2615 
2616  if (direction == FORWARD)
2617  {
2618  *date_diff = -(*date_diff);
2619  }
2620 
2621 exit:
2622  return err_status;
2623 }
2624 
2625 /*
2626  * get_closest_ds_rule() - Returns the id of the closest daylight saving rule in the ds_ruleset relative to to_year
2627  * or from_year
2628  *
2629  * Returns: the id of the rule or -1 in case of error
2630  * src_julian_date(in): input source date
2631  * src_time_sec(in): input source time
2632  * ds_ruleset(in): input ds_ruleset
2633  * tzd(in): pointer to the tzdata
2634  * direction(in): input flag that tells us in which direction to search
2635  */
2636 static int
2637 get_closest_ds_rule (const int src_julian_date, const int src_time_sec, const TZ_DS_RULESET * ds_ruleset,
2638  const TZ_DATA * tzd, const DS_SEARCH_DIRECTION direction)
2639 {
2640  int curr_ds_id = 0;
2641  int closest_ds_rule_id = 0;
2642  TZ_DS_RULE *ds_rule;
2643  full_date_t best_diff = -1;
2644  full_date_t date_diff;
2645  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
2646 
2647  for (; curr_ds_id < ds_ruleset->count; curr_ds_id++)
2648  {
2649  ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[curr_ds_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
2650 
2651  err_status = get_date_diff_from_ds_rule (src_julian_date, src_time_sec, ds_rule, direction, &date_diff);
2652  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
2653  {
2654  return -1;
2655  }
2656  if (direction == FORWARD && ds_rule->save_time != 0)
2657  {
2658  continue;
2659  }
2660  if (best_diff == -1 || date_diff < best_diff)
2661  {
2662  best_diff = date_diff;
2663  closest_ds_rule_id = curr_ds_id;
2664  }
2665  }
2666 
2667  return closest_ds_rule_id;
2668 }
2669 
2670 /*
2671  * get_saving_time_from_offset_rule() - Computes the daylight saving time for the last day when the input offset
2672  * rule applies
2673  *
2674  * Returns: error or no error
2675  * offset_rule(in): input offset rule
2676  * tzd(in): timezone data
2677  * save_time(out): output daylight saving time
2678  *
2679  */
2680 static int
2681 get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (const TZ_OFFSET_RULE * offset_rule, const TZ_DATA * tzd, int *save_time)
2682 {
2683  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
2684 
2685  *save_time = 0;
2686  if (offset_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID)
2687  {
2688  int ds_rule_id = -1;
2689  TZ_DS_RULESET *ds_ruleset_off_rule;
2690  int offset_rule_src_year;
2691  int offset_rule_src_month;
2692 
2693  julian_decode (offset_rule->julian_date, &offset_rule_src_month, NULL, &offset_rule_src_year, NULL);
2694  ds_ruleset_off_rule = &(tzd->ds_rulesets[offset_rule->ds_ruleset]);
2695 
2696  err_status =
2697  tz_fast_find_ds_rule (tzd, ds_ruleset_off_rule, offset_rule->julian_date, offset_rule_src_year,
2698  offset_rule_src_month, &ds_rule_id);
2699  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
2700  {
2701  goto exit;
2702  }
2703 
2704  if (ds_rule_id != -1)
2705  {
2706  TZ_DS_RULE *ds_rule;
2707 
2708  assert (ds_rule_id + ds_ruleset_off_rule->index_start < tzd->ds_rule_count);
2709 
2710  ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[ds_rule_id + ds_ruleset_off_rule->index_start]);
2711  *save_time = ds_rule->save_time;
2712  }
2713  }
2714  else
2715  {
2716  *save_time = offset_rule->ds_ruleset;
2717  }
2718 exit:
2719  return err_status;
2720 }
2721 
2722 /*
2723  * is_in_overlap_interval() - Verifies if a specific date is in the overlap interval between two offset rules
2724  *
2725  * Returns: true or false
2726  * time_type(in): time reference
2727  * offset_rule_diff(in): time difference between the date and the time when the first offset rule ends
2728  * gmt_diff(in): offset time difference between the two offset rules
2729  * save_time_diff(in): daylight saving time difference between the two offset rules
2730  *
2731  */
2732 static bool
2733 is_in_overlap_interval (const TZ_TIME_TYPE time_type, const full_date_t offset_rule_diff, const full_date_t gmt_diff,
2734  const int save_time_diff)
2735 {
2736  full_date_t add_time = 0;
2737  bool overlap = true;
2738 
2739  if (time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
2740  {
2741  add_time = save_time_diff;
2742  }
2743  else if (time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_UTC)
2744  {
2745  add_time = gmt_diff + save_time_diff;
2746  }
2747 
2748  if (gmt_diff + save_time_diff > 0 || (ABS (offset_rule_diff + add_time) > ABS (gmt_diff + save_time_diff)))
2749  {
2750  overlap = false;
2751  }
2752 
2753  return overlap;
2754 }
2755 
2756 /*
2757  * get_year_to_apply_rule() - Computes the year in which to apply a daylight saving rule given the source year
2758  *
2759  *
2760  * Returns: the year in which to apply the daylight saving rule
2761  * src_year(in): source year
2762  * ds_rule(in): daylight saving rule
2763  *
2764  */
2765 static int
2766 get_year_to_apply_rule (const int src_year, const TZ_DS_RULE * ds_rule)
2767 {
2768  int year_to_apply_rule;
2769 
2770  if (src_year <= ds_rule->to_year)
2771  {
2772  if (src_year >= ds_rule->from_year)
2773  {
2774  year_to_apply_rule = src_year;
2775  }
2776  else
2777  {
2778  year_to_apply_rule = ds_rule->from_year;
2779  }
2780  }
2781  else
2782  {
2783  year_to_apply_rule = src_year - 1;
2784  }
2785 
2786  return year_to_apply_rule;
2787 }
2788 
2789 /*
2790  * tz_datetime_utc_conv () -
2791  *
2792  * Return: error code
2793  * src_dt(in): object containing source datetime value;
2794  * if 'src_is_utc' is true, than is UTC datetime, otherwise is local datetime
2795  * tz_info(in/out): (partial) decoded timezone info associated with source datetime, additional information is
2796  * changed/added after conversion
2797  * src_is_utc(in): true if 'src_dt' is in UTC time reference, false if src_dt is in local time reference
2798  * only_tz_adjust(in): true if only timezone adjustment is desired, datetime itself is not changed (used in context of
2799  * datetime arithmetic)
2800  * dt_dest(out): object containing destination datetime
2801  *
2802  */
2803 static int
2804 tz_datetime_utc_conv (const DB_DATETIME * src_dt, TZ_DECODE_INFO * tz_info, bool src_is_utc, bool only_tz_adjust,
2805  DB_DATETIME * dest_dt)
2806 {
2807  int src_julian_date, rule_julian_date;
2808  int src_time_sec, rule_time_sec;
2809  int src_year;
2810  int src_month;
2811  int gmt_std_offset_sec;
2812  int total_offset_sec;
2813  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
2814  int curr_offset_id = -1;
2815  int curr_ds_id = -1, applying_ds_id = -1;
2816  full_date_t applying_date_diff = -1;
2817  TZ_TIMEZONE *timezone;
2818  const TZ_DATA *tzd;
2819  TZ_OFFSET_RULE *curr_off_rule = NULL, *next_off_rule = NULL;
2820  TZ_OFFSET_RULE *prev_off_rule = NULL;
2821  TZ_DS_RULESET *ds_ruleset;
2822  TZ_DS_RULE *curr_ds_rule, *applying_ds_rule;
2823  bool check_user_dst = false;
2824  bool applying_with_prev_year = false;
2825  bool applying_is_in_leap_interval = false;
2826  int save_time = 0, src_offset_curr_off_rule = 0;
2827  int src_offset_prev_off_rule = 0;
2828  int leap_offset_rule_interval = 0;
2829  int prev_rule_julian_date = 0, prev_rule_time_sec = 0;
2830  bool try_offset_rule_overlap = false;
2831  int second_best_applying_ds_id = -1;
2832  full_date_t second_best_applying_date_diff = -1;
2833  TZ_DS_RULE *second_best_applying_ds_rule = NULL;
2834  int offset_rule_counter = 0;
2835  TZ_OFFSET_RULE *offset_rules[2] = { NULL };
2836 
2837  if (tz_info->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
2838  {
2839  /* keep offset and zone decode info */
2840  total_offset_sec = tz_info->offset;
2841  if (total_offset_sec == TZ_INVALID_OFFSET)
2842  {
2843 #if !defined (CS_MODE)
2844  assert (BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ());
2845 #endif
2846  err_status = ER_TZ_INTERNAL_ERROR;
2847  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
2848  }
2849  goto exit;
2850  }
2851 
2852  assert (tz_info->type == TZ_REGION_ZONE);
2853 
2854  tzd = tz_get_data ();
2855 
2856  if (tzd == NULL)
2857  {
2858  err_status = ER_TZ_INTERNAL_ERROR;
2859  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
2860  goto exit;
2861  }
2862 
2863  if ((src_dt->time > MILLIS_IN_A_DAY))
2864  {
2865  err_status = ER_TIME_CONVERSION;
2866  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_TIME_CONVERSION, 0);
2867  goto exit;
2868  }
2869  /* start decoding zone , GMT offset id, DST id */
2870  assert ((int) tz_info->zone.zone_id < tzd->name_count);
2871  timezone = &(tzd->timezones[tzd->names[tz_info->zone.zone_id].zone_id]);
2872 
2873  assert (timezone->gmt_off_rule_count > 0);
2874 
2875  src_julian_date = src_dt->date;
2876  src_time_sec = src_dt->time / 1000;
2877 
2878  for (curr_offset_id = 0; curr_offset_id < timezone->gmt_off_rule_count; curr_offset_id++)
2879  {
2880  assert (timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + curr_offset_id < tzd->offset_rule_count);
2881  prev_off_rule = curr_off_rule;
2882  curr_off_rule = &(tzd->offset_rules[timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + curr_offset_id]);
2883 
2884  if (curr_off_rule->until_flag == UNTIL_EXPLICIT)
2885  {
2886  rule_julian_date = curr_off_rule->julian_date;
2887  rule_time_sec = (curr_off_rule->until_hour * 60 + curr_off_rule->until_min) * 60 + curr_off_rule->until_sec;
2888  }
2889  else
2890  {
2891  rule_julian_date = TZ_MAX_JULIAN_DATE;
2892  rule_time_sec = 0;
2893  }
2894 
2895  /* add a safety buffer of 1 julian day */
2896  if (src_julian_date <= rule_julian_date + 1)
2897  {
2898  /* this is a candidate, we still have to check the exact time when rule ends */
2899  if (curr_off_rule->until_flag == UNTIL_EXPLICIT)
2900  {
2901  /* set also next */
2902  assert (curr_offset_id < timezone->gmt_off_rule_count - 1);
2903  assert (timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + curr_offset_id + 1 < tzd->offset_rule_count);
2904  next_off_rule = &(tzd->offset_rules[timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + curr_offset_id + 1]);
2905  if (timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + curr_offset_id + 2 < tzd->offset_rule_count)
2906  {
2907  offset_rules[0] = &(tzd->offset_rules[timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + curr_offset_id + 2]);
2908  }
2909  }
2910  /* rule found */
2911  break;
2912  }
2913  }
2914 
2915  assert (curr_off_rule != NULL);
2916  assert (next_off_rule != NULL || curr_off_rule->until_flag == UNTIL_INFINITE);
2917 
2918  julian_decode (src_julian_date, &src_month, NULL, &src_year, NULL);
2919 
2920 detect_dst:
2921  if (curr_off_rule->until_flag == UNTIL_EXPLICIT)
2922  {
2923  rule_julian_date = curr_off_rule->julian_date;
2924  rule_time_sec = (curr_off_rule->until_hour * 60 + curr_off_rule->until_min) * 60 + curr_off_rule->until_sec;
2925  }
2926  else
2927  {
2928  rule_julian_date = TZ_MAX_JULIAN_DATE;
2929  rule_time_sec = 0;
2930  }
2931 
2932  applying_ds_id = -1;
2933  applying_date_diff = -1;
2934  gmt_std_offset_sec = curr_off_rule->gmt_off;
2935  total_offset_sec = gmt_std_offset_sec;
2936  second_best_applying_ds_id = -1;
2937  second_best_applying_date_diff = -1;
2938 
2939  if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
2940  {
2941  prev_rule_julian_date = prev_off_rule->julian_date;
2942  prev_rule_time_sec = (prev_off_rule->until_hour * 60 + prev_off_rule->until_min) * 60 + prev_off_rule->until_sec;
2943  leap_offset_rule_interval = curr_off_rule->gmt_off - prev_off_rule->gmt_off;
2944  }
2945 
2946  if (curr_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_FIXED)
2947  {
2948  int curr_time_offset;
2949  full_date_t offset_rule_diff;
2950 
2951  curr_time_offset =
2952  tz_offset (src_is_utc, curr_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, curr_off_rule->ds_ruleset);
2953  if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
2954  {
2955  src_offset_prev_off_rule =
2956  tz_offset (src_is_utc, prev_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, curr_off_rule->ds_ruleset);
2957  }
2958 
2959  offset_rule_diff =
2960  FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + src_offset_prev_off_rule) - FULL_DATE (prev_rule_julian_date,
2961  prev_rule_time_sec);
2962 
2963  if (FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + curr_time_offset) < FULL_DATE (rule_julian_date, rule_time_sec))
2964  {
2965  int add_ds_save_time_diff = 0;
2966  int prev_rule_save_time = 0;
2967  full_date_t leap = 0;
2968 
2969  if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
2970  {
2971  if (prev_off_rule->until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_WALL)
2972  {
2973  add_ds_save_time_diff = curr_off_rule->ds_ruleset;
2974  if (offset_rule_diff <= 2 * SECONDS_IN_A_DAY)
2975  {
2976  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &prev_rule_save_time);
2977  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
2978  {
2979  goto exit;
2980  }
2981  }
2982  add_ds_save_time_diff -= prev_rule_save_time;
2983  leap = leap_offset_rule_interval + add_ds_save_time_diff;
2984  }
2985  else if (prev_off_rule->until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
2986  {
2987  leap = leap_offset_rule_interval;
2988  }
2989  }
2990 
2991  if (try_offset_rule_overlap == false && leap >= 0 && (offset_rule_diff < leap))
2992  {
2993  /* invalid time, abort */
2994  err_status = ER_TZ_DURING_OFFSET_RULE_LEAP;
2995  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
2996  goto exit;
2997  }
2998 
2999  if (src_is_utc == false && tz_info->zone.dst_str[0] != '\0' && curr_off_rule->var_format == NULL
3000  && (curr_off_rule->std_format == NULL
3001  || strcasecmp (curr_off_rule->std_format, tz_info->zone.dst_str) != 0)
3002  && (curr_off_rule->save_format == NULL
3003  || strcasecmp (curr_off_rule->save_format, tz_info->zone.dst_str) != 0))
3004  {
3005  if (next_off_rule == NULL || try_offset_rule_overlap == true)
3006  {
3007  err_status = ER_TZ_INVALID_COMBINATION;
3008  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3009  goto exit;
3010  }
3011  else
3012  {
3013  try_offset_rule_overlap = true;
3014  APPLY_NEXT_OFF_RULE ();
3015  goto detect_dst;
3016  }
3017  }
3018  else if (src_is_utc == false && tz_info->zone.dst_str[0] != '\0' && try_offset_rule_overlap == true)
3019  {
3020  bool overlap = false;
3021 
3022  if (ABS (offset_rule_diff) <= 3 * SECONDS_IN_A_DAY)
3023  {
3024  int prev_rule_save_time = 0;
3025  int save_time_diff = 0;
3026 
3027  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &prev_rule_save_time);
3028  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3029  {
3030  goto exit;
3031  }
3032 
3033  save_time_diff = curr_off_rule->ds_ruleset - prev_rule_save_time;
3034  overlap =
3035  is_in_overlap_interval (prev_off_rule->until_time_type, offset_rule_diff, leap_offset_rule_interval,
3036  save_time_diff);
3037  }
3038 
3039  if (overlap == false)
3040  {
3041  /* invalid time, abort */
3042  err_status = ER_TZ_INVALID_COMBINATION;
3043  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3044  goto exit;
3045  }
3046  }
3047 
3048  applying_ds_id = 0;
3049  /* finished */
3050  goto exit;
3051  }
3052 
3053  /* try next GMT offset zone */
3054  if (next_off_rule == NULL)
3055  {
3056  err_status = ER_TZ_INVALID_COMBINATION;
3057  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3058  goto exit;
3059  }
3060  APPLY_NEXT_OFF_RULE ();
3061  goto detect_dst;
3062  }
3063 
3064  /* the zone uses DST rules */
3065  assert (curr_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID);
3066  assert (curr_off_rule->ds_ruleset < tzd->ds_ruleset_count);
3067  ds_ruleset = &(tzd->ds_rulesets[curr_off_rule->ds_ruleset]);
3068 
3069  applying_ds_rule = NULL;
3070  second_best_applying_ds_rule = NULL;
3071  if (src_is_utc == false && tz_info->zone.dst_str[0] != '\0')
3072  {
3073  check_user_dst = true;
3074  }
3075 
3076  if ((src_year > ds_ruleset->to_year_max && src_month > TZ_MON_JAN) || (src_year > ds_ruleset->to_year_max + 1))
3077  {
3078  curr_ds_id = ds_ruleset->count;
3079  }
3080  else
3081  {
3082  curr_ds_id = 0;
3083  }
3084 
3085  for (; curr_ds_id < ds_ruleset->count; curr_ds_id++)
3086  {
3087  int ds_rule_julian_date;
3088  full_date_t date_diff;
3089  bool rule_matched = false;
3090  bool is_in_leap_interval = false;
3091  bool check_prev_year = true;
3092  int year_to_apply_rule = 0;
3093  TZ_DS_RULE *wall_ds_rule = NULL;
3094 
3095  assert (curr_ds_id + ds_ruleset->index_start < tzd->ds_rule_count);
3096  curr_ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[curr_ds_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
3097 
3098  if (src_year + 1 < curr_ds_rule->from_year)
3099  {
3100  /* no more rules will match */
3101  break;
3102  }
3103 
3104  if (src_year - 1 > curr_ds_rule->to_year
3105  || (src_year > ds_ruleset->to_year_max && curr_ds_rule->in_month < TZ_MON_DEC))
3106  {
3107  full_date_t diff;
3108  full_date_t ds_rule_date = 0;
3109 
3110  /* We don't need here the date difference so we use only rule date */
3111  err_status =
3112  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (0, curr_ds_rule, curr_ds_rule->to_year, &ds_rule_julian_date, NULL);
3113  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3114  {
3115  goto exit;
3116  }
3117 
3118  ds_rule_date = FULL_DATE (ds_rule_julian_date, curr_ds_rule->at_time);
3119  diff = FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec) - ds_rule_date;
3120 
3121  if (second_best_applying_date_diff == -1 || diff < second_best_applying_date_diff)
3122  {
3123  second_best_applying_date_diff = diff;
3124  second_best_applying_ds_id = curr_ds_id;
3125  second_best_applying_ds_rule = curr_ds_rule;
3126  }
3127 
3128  /* this rule cannot apply */
3129  continue;
3130  }
3131  else if (src_year < curr_ds_rule->from_year && curr_ds_rule->in_month > TZ_MON_JAN)
3132  {
3133  continue;
3134  }
3135 
3136  year_to_apply_rule = get_year_to_apply_rule (src_year, curr_ds_rule);
3137  err_status =
3138  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (src_julian_date, curr_ds_rule, year_to_apply_rule, &ds_rule_julian_date,
3139  &date_diff);
3140  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3141  {
3142  goto exit;
3143  }
3144 
3145  if (date_diff >= DATE_DIFF_MATCH_SAFE_THRESHOLD_SEC)
3146  {
3147  /* a date difference of at two days */
3148  rule_matched = true;
3149  }
3150  else if (ABS (date_diff) < DATE_DIFF_MATCH_SAFE_THRESHOLD_SEC)
3151  {
3152  int wall_ds_rule_id;
3153  int wall_safe_julian_date;
3154  full_date_t leap_interval;
3155  int ds_time_offset = 0;
3156  full_date_t ds_rule_date = 0;
3157  full_date_t utc_src_offset = 0;
3158  int save_time = 0;
3159  bool at_time_type_is_utc = false;
3160  int ds_rule_time_offset_curr_off_rule = 0, add_save_time = 0;
3161  int ds_rule_time_offset_prev_off_rule = 0;
3162  int add_leap_offset_rule_interval = 0;
3163 
3164  /* there may be an ambiguity : check the time deviation of a date before current candidate DS rule applies
3165  * (to be safe, 4 days before) */
3166  wall_safe_julian_date = src_julian_date - 2 * DATE_DIFF_MATCH_SAFE_THRESHOLD_DAYS;
3167 
3168  err_status =
3169  tz_fast_find_ds_rule (tzd, ds_ruleset, wall_safe_julian_date, src_year, src_month, &wall_ds_rule_id);
3170  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3171  {
3172  goto exit;
3173  }
3174 
3175  if (wall_ds_rule_id != -1)
3176  {
3177  assert (wall_ds_rule_id + ds_ruleset->index_start < tzd->ds_rule_count);
3178  wall_ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[wall_ds_rule_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
3179  save_time = wall_ds_rule->save_time;
3180  }
3181  else if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
3182  {
3183  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &save_time);
3184  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3185  {
3186  goto exit;
3187  }
3188  add_leap_offset_rule_interval = leap_offset_rule_interval;
3189  }
3190 
3191  if (curr_ds_rule->at_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_UTC)
3192  {
3193  at_time_type_is_utc = true;
3194  }
3195 
3196  if (wall_ds_rule != NULL && prev_off_rule != NULL)
3197  {
3198  bool utc_time = false;
3199  int ds_rule_time_offset;
3200  full_date_t date_diff;
3201  int wall_rule_julian_date;
3202  int add_save_time = 0;
3203  int year_to_apply_rule;
3204 
3205  year_to_apply_rule = get_year_to_apply_rule (src_year, wall_ds_rule);
3206  err_status =
3207  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (wall_safe_julian_date, wall_ds_rule, year_to_apply_rule,
3208  &wall_rule_julian_date, &date_diff);
3209  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3210  {
3211  goto exit;
3212  }
3213  if (date_diff < 0)
3214  {
3215  year_to_apply_rule = year_to_apply_rule - 1;
3216  err_status =
3217  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (0, wall_ds_rule, year_to_apply_rule, &wall_rule_julian_date,
3218  NULL);
3219  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3220  {
3221  goto exit;
3222  }
3223  }
3224 
3225  if (wall_ds_rule->at_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_UTC)
3226  {
3227  utc_time = true;
3228  }
3229 
3230  ds_rule_time_offset = tz_offset (utc_time, prev_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, 0);
3231  date_diff =
3232  FULL_DATE (wall_rule_julian_date,
3233  wall_ds_rule->at_time + ds_rule_time_offset) - FULL_DATE (prev_rule_julian_date,
3234  prev_rule_time_sec);
3235 
3236  if (date_diff < 0)
3237  {
3238  int prev_rule_save_time;
3239 
3240  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &prev_rule_save_time);
3241  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3242  {
3243  goto exit;
3244  }
3245 
3246  ds_rule_time_offset =
3247  tz_offset (at_time_type_is_utc, prev_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, save_time);
3248  if (curr_ds_rule->at_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
3249  {
3250  add_save_time = save_time;
3251  }
3252 
3253  if (FULL_DATE (ds_rule_julian_date, curr_ds_rule->at_time + add_save_time + ds_rule_time_offset) <=
3254  FULL_DATE (prev_rule_julian_date, prev_rule_time_sec))
3255  {
3256  save_time = prev_rule_save_time;
3257  add_leap_offset_rule_interval = leap_offset_rule_interval;
3258  }
3259  }
3260  }
3261 
3262  if (curr_ds_rule->at_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
3263  {
3264  add_save_time = save_time;
3265  }
3266 
3267  if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
3268  {
3269  ds_rule_time_offset_prev_off_rule =
3270  tz_offset (at_time_type_is_utc, prev_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, save_time);
3271  if (FULL_DATE
3272  (ds_rule_julian_date,
3273  curr_ds_rule->at_time + add_save_time + ds_rule_time_offset_prev_off_rule) >
3274  FULL_DATE (prev_rule_julian_date, prev_rule_time_sec))
3275  {
3276  add_leap_offset_rule_interval = 0;
3277  }
3278  }
3279 
3280  ds_rule_time_offset_curr_off_rule =
3281  tz_offset (at_time_type_is_utc, curr_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, save_time);
3282 
3283  if (FULL_DATE (ds_rule_julian_date, curr_ds_rule->at_time + add_save_time + ds_rule_time_offset_curr_off_rule)
3284  >= FULL_DATE (rule_julian_date, rule_time_sec))
3285  {
3286  continue;
3287  }
3288 
3289  /* the difference between the input date and the rule date must be made in the same time reference, in our
3290  * case it is the local time reference */
3291  /* ds_time_offset is used to adjust the time at which the new daylight saving rule applies */
3292 
3293  if (curr_ds_rule->at_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_UTC)
3294  {
3295  ds_time_offset = gmt_std_offset_sec + curr_ds_rule->save_time;
3296  }
3297  else if (curr_ds_rule->at_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
3298  {
3299  ds_time_offset = curr_ds_rule->save_time;
3300  }
3301  else if (curr_ds_rule->at_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_WALL)
3302  {
3303  /* wall clock: may indicate either the daylight time or standard time */
3304  ds_time_offset = curr_ds_rule->save_time - save_time;
3305  }
3306  if (curr_ds_rule->at_time_type != TZ_TIME_TYPE_UTC)
3307  {
3308  ds_time_offset += add_leap_offset_rule_interval;
3309  }
3310 
3311  if (src_is_utc == true)
3312  {
3313  /* UTC time always exists, thus we don't need to take into consideration leap interval overlap */
3314  leap_interval = 0;
3315  utc_src_offset = gmt_std_offset_sec + curr_ds_rule->save_time;
3316  }
3317  else
3318  {
3319  leap_interval = save_time - curr_ds_rule->save_time;
3320  leap_interval -= add_leap_offset_rule_interval;
3321  }
3322 
3323  ds_rule_date = FULL_DATE (ds_rule_julian_date, ds_time_offset + curr_ds_rule->at_time);
3324  date_diff = FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + utc_src_offset) - ds_rule_date;
3325 
3326  if (date_diff >= 0)
3327  {
3328  rule_matched = true;
3329 
3330  if (leap_interval > 0 && date_diff < leap_interval)
3331  {
3332  is_in_leap_interval = true;
3333  }
3334  }
3335  else
3336  {
3337  if (leap_interval < 0 && ABS (date_diff) <= ABS (leap_interval))
3338  {
3339  int offset;
3340 
3341  offset = tz_offset (src_is_utc, curr_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, 0);
3342 
3343  if (FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + offset) < FULL_DATE (rule_julian_date, rule_time_sec))
3344  {
3345  /* invalid time, abort */
3346  err_status = ER_TZ_DURING_DS_LEAP;
3347  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3348  goto exit;
3349  }
3350  else
3351  {
3352  applying_ds_id = -1;
3353  second_best_applying_ds_id = -1;
3354  break;
3355  }
3356  }
3357  }
3358  }
3359 
3360  match_ds_rule:
3361  if (rule_matched)
3362  {
3363  assert (date_diff >= 0);
3364 
3365  if (applying_date_diff > 0 && date_diff > applying_date_diff && !applying_is_in_leap_interval)
3366  {
3367  /* a better rule was previously found */
3368  continue;
3369  }
3370 
3371  if (is_in_leap_interval || applying_is_in_leap_interval)
3372  {
3373  if (check_user_dst)
3374  {
3375  rule_matched =
3376  tz_check_ds_match_string (curr_off_rule, curr_ds_rule, tz_info->zone.dst_str,
3377  ds_ruleset->default_abrev);
3378  }
3379  else if (applying_ds_id != -1)
3380  {
3381  /* ambiguity : user did not specified a daylight saving; a previous rule was matched, but also the
3382  * current one is; We are during the DS interval change, we choose the one before (timewise) DS
3383  * change is performed */
3384  if (applying_date_diff > date_diff || applying_with_prev_year)
3385  {
3386  rule_matched = false;
3387  }
3388  }
3389  }
3390 
3391  if (rule_matched
3392  && (applying_date_diff < 0 || date_diff < applying_date_diff || applying_is_in_leap_interval))
3393  {
3394  if (is_in_leap_interval == true && wall_ds_rule != NULL && check_user_dst == true
3395  && tz_check_ds_match_string (curr_off_rule, wall_ds_rule, tz_info->zone.dst_str,
3396  ds_ruleset->default_abrev) == true)
3397  {
3398  continue;
3399  }
3400  /* this is the best rule so far (ignoring user DST) */
3401  applying_date_diff = date_diff;
3402  applying_ds_rule = curr_ds_rule;
3403  applying_ds_id = curr_ds_id;
3404  applying_is_in_leap_interval = is_in_leap_interval;
3405  if (check_prev_year == false)
3406  {
3407  applying_with_prev_year = true;
3408  }
3409  }
3410  }
3411  else if (curr_ds_rule->from_year < src_year && check_prev_year == true && date_diff < 0)
3412  {
3413  err_status =
3414  tz_get_ds_change_julian_date_diff (src_julian_date, curr_ds_rule, src_year - 1, &ds_rule_julian_date,
3415  &date_diff);
3416  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3417  {
3418  goto exit;
3419  }
3420 
3421  assert (date_diff >= 0);
3422  rule_matched = true;
3423  check_prev_year = false;
3424 
3425  goto match_ds_rule;
3426  }
3427  }
3428 
3429  if (applying_ds_id == -1)
3430  {
3431  applying_ds_id = second_best_applying_ds_id;
3432  applying_ds_rule = second_best_applying_ds_rule;
3433  }
3434 
3435  if (applying_ds_id != -1)
3436  {
3437  save_time = applying_ds_rule->save_time;
3438  }
3439  src_offset_curr_off_rule = tz_offset (src_is_utc, curr_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, save_time);
3440  if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
3441  {
3442  src_offset_prev_off_rule = tz_offset (src_is_utc, prev_off_rule->until_time_type, gmt_std_offset_sec, save_time);
3443  }
3444 
3445  if (applying_ds_id != -1)
3446  {
3447  full_date_t offset_rule_diff;
3448  int add_ds_save_time = 0;
3449  full_date_t leap = 0;
3450 
3451  if (FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + src_offset_curr_off_rule) >=
3452  FULL_DATE (rule_julian_date, rule_time_sec))
3453  {
3454  APPLY_NEXT_OFF_RULE ();
3455  goto detect_dst;
3456  }
3457 
3458  offset_rule_diff =
3459  FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + src_offset_prev_off_rule) - FULL_DATE (prev_rule_julian_date,
3460  prev_rule_time_sec);
3461 
3462  if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
3463  {
3464  if (prev_off_rule->until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_WALL)
3465  {
3466  int prev_rule_save_time = 0;
3467 
3468  add_ds_save_time = save_time;
3469  if (offset_rule_diff <= 2 * SECONDS_IN_A_DAY)
3470  {
3471  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &prev_rule_save_time);
3472  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3473  {
3474  goto exit;
3475  }
3476  }
3477  add_ds_save_time -= prev_rule_save_time;
3478  leap = leap_offset_rule_interval + add_ds_save_time;
3479  }
3480  else if (prev_off_rule->until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
3481  {
3482  leap = leap_offset_rule_interval;
3483  }
3484  }
3485 
3486  if (try_offset_rule_overlap == false && leap >= 0 && (offset_rule_diff < leap))
3487  {
3488  /* invalid time, abort */
3489  err_status = ER_TZ_DURING_OFFSET_RULE_LEAP;
3490  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3491  goto exit;
3492  }
3493 
3494  if (check_user_dst)
3495  {
3496  if (tz_check_ds_match_string
3497  (curr_off_rule, applying_ds_rule, tz_info->zone.dst_str, ds_ruleset->default_abrev) == false)
3498  {
3499  if (next_off_rule == NULL || try_offset_rule_overlap == true)
3500  {
3501  err_status = ER_TZ_INVALID_COMBINATION;
3502  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3503  goto exit;
3504  }
3505  /* try the next offset rule to see if we have an ambiguous time */
3506  else
3507  {
3508  try_offset_rule_overlap = true;
3509  APPLY_NEXT_OFF_RULE ();
3510  goto detect_dst;
3511  }
3512  }
3513  /* we need to see if we have an overlap with the previous rule in this case */
3514  else if (try_offset_rule_overlap == true)
3515  {
3516  bool overlap = false;
3517 
3518  if (ABS (offset_rule_diff) <= 3 * SECONDS_IN_A_DAY)
3519  {
3520  int prev_rule_save_time = 0;
3521  int save_time_diff = 0;
3522 
3523  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &prev_rule_save_time);
3524  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3525  {
3526  goto exit;
3527  }
3528 
3529  save_time_diff = save_time - prev_rule_save_time;
3530  overlap =
3531  is_in_overlap_interval (prev_off_rule->until_time_type, offset_rule_diff, leap_offset_rule_interval,
3532  save_time_diff);
3533  }
3534 
3535  if (overlap == false)
3536  {
3537  /* invalid time, abort */
3538  err_status = ER_TZ_INVALID_COMBINATION;
3539  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3540  goto exit;
3541  }
3542  }
3543  }
3544  }
3545  else
3546  {
3547  /* try next GMT offset zone */
3548  if (next_off_rule == NULL
3549  || (FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + src_offset_curr_off_rule) <
3550  FULL_DATE (rule_julian_date, rule_time_sec)))
3551  {
3552  full_date_t offset_rule_diff;
3553  int add_ds_save_time = 0;
3554  full_date_t leap = 0;
3555 
3556  offset_rule_diff =
3557  FULL_DATE (src_julian_date, src_time_sec + src_offset_prev_off_rule) - FULL_DATE (prev_rule_julian_date,
3558  prev_rule_time_sec);
3559 
3560  if (prev_off_rule != NULL)
3561  {
3562  if (prev_off_rule->until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_WALL)
3563  {
3564  int prev_rule_save_time = 0;
3565 
3566  add_ds_save_time = save_time;
3567  if (offset_rule_diff <= 2 * SECONDS_IN_A_DAY)
3568  {
3569  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &prev_rule_save_time);
3570  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3571  {
3572  goto exit;
3573  }
3574  }
3575  add_ds_save_time -= prev_rule_save_time;
3576  leap = leap_offset_rule_interval + add_ds_save_time;
3577  }
3578  else if (prev_off_rule->until_time_type == TZ_TIME_TYPE_LOCAL_STD)
3579  {
3580  leap = leap_offset_rule_interval;
3581  }
3582  }
3583 
3584  if (try_offset_rule_overlap == false && leap >= 0 && (offset_rule_diff < leap))
3585  {
3586  /* invalid time, abort */
3587  err_status = ER_TZ_DURING_OFFSET_RULE_LEAP;
3588  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3589  goto exit;
3590  }
3591 
3592  if (curr_ds_id == ds_ruleset->count)
3593  {
3594  applying_ds_id = get_closest_ds_rule (src_julian_date, src_time_sec, ds_ruleset, tzd, BACKWARD);
3595  }
3596  else
3597  {
3598  applying_ds_id = get_closest_ds_rule (src_julian_date, src_time_sec, ds_ruleset, tzd, FORWARD);
3599  }
3600 
3601  assert (applying_ds_id + ds_ruleset->index_start < tzd->ds_rule_count);
3602  applying_ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[applying_ds_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
3603 
3604  /* check if provided DS specifier matches the offset rule format */
3605  if (tz_info->zone.dst_str[0] != '\0'
3606  && tz_check_ds_match_string (curr_off_rule, applying_ds_rule, tz_info->zone.dst_str,
3607  ds_ruleset->default_abrev) == false)
3608  {
3609  if (next_off_rule == NULL || try_offset_rule_overlap == true)
3610  {
3611  err_status = ER_TZ_INVALID_DST;
3612  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3613  goto exit;
3614  }
3615  else
3616  {
3617  try_offset_rule_overlap = true;
3618  APPLY_NEXT_OFF_RULE ();
3619  goto detect_dst;
3620  }
3621  }
3622  else if (tz_info->zone.dst_str[0] != '\0'
3623  && tz_check_ds_match_string (curr_off_rule, applying_ds_rule, tz_info->zone.dst_str,
3624  ds_ruleset->default_abrev) == true && try_offset_rule_overlap == true)
3625  {
3626  bool overlap = false;
3627 
3628  if (ABS (offset_rule_diff) <= 3 * SECONDS_IN_A_DAY)
3629  {
3630  int prev_rule_save_time = 0;
3631  int save_time_diff = 0;
3632 
3633  err_status = get_saving_time_from_offset_rule (prev_off_rule, tzd, &prev_rule_save_time);
3634  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3635  {
3636  goto exit;
3637  }
3638 
3639  save_time_diff = save_time - prev_rule_save_time;
3640  overlap =
3641  is_in_overlap_interval (prev_off_rule->until_time_type, offset_rule_diff, leap_offset_rule_interval,
3642  save_time_diff);
3643  }
3644  if (overlap == false)
3645  {
3646  /* invalid time, abort */
3647  err_status = ER_TZ_INVALID_COMBINATION;
3648  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
3649  goto exit;
3650  }
3651  }
3652 
3653  goto exit;
3654  }
3655  APPLY_NEXT_OFF_RULE ();
3656  goto detect_dst;
3657  }
3658 
3659  assert (applying_ds_rule != NULL);
3660 
3661  total_offset_sec += applying_ds_rule->save_time;
3662 
3663  assert (curr_offset_id != -1);
3664  assert (applying_ds_id != -1);
3665 
3666 exit:
3667  if (err_status == NO_ERROR)
3668  {
3669  if (curr_offset_id >= 0)
3670  {
3671  if (curr_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_FIXED)
3672  {
3673  total_offset_sec += curr_off_rule->ds_ruleset;
3674  }
3675 
3676  tz_info->zone.offset_id = curr_offset_id;
3677 
3678  if (applying_ds_id >= 0)
3679  {
3680  tz_info->zone.dst_id = applying_ds_id;
3681  }
3682  }
3683 
3684  if (only_tz_adjust == true)
3685  {
3686  *dest_dt = *src_dt;
3687  }
3688  else
3689  {
3690  if (src_dt->date == 0)
3691  {
3692  assert (src_dt->time == 0);
3693  *dest_dt = *src_dt;
3694  }
3695  else
3696  {
3697  err_status =
3698  db_add_int_to_datetime ((DB_DATETIME *) src_dt, -1000 * TIME_OFFSET (src_is_utc, total_offset_sec),
3699  dest_dt);
3700  }
3701  }
3702  }
3703 
3704  return err_status;
3705 }
3706 
3707 /*
3708  * tz_conv_tz_datetime_w_zone_info () - Converts a source DATETIME from one timezone to another
3709  *
3710  * Return: error code
3711  * src_dt(in): object containing source datetime value;
3712  * src_zone_info_in(in): (partial) decoded timezone info associated with source datetime
3713  * dest_zone_info_in(in): (partial) decoded timezone info for the desired timezone
3714  * dest_dt(out): destination datetime value
3715  * src_zone_info_out(out): complete timezone information for source
3716  * dest_zone_info_out(out): complete timezone information for destination
3717  */
3718 static int
3719 tz_conv_tz_datetime_w_zone_info (const DB_DATETIME * src_dt, const TZ_DECODE_INFO * src_zone_info_in,
3720  const TZ_DECODE_INFO * dest_zone_info_in, DB_DATETIME * dest_dt,
3721  TZ_DECODE_INFO * src_zone_info_out, TZ_DECODE_INFO * dest_zone_info_out)
3722 {
3723  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
3724  DB_DATETIME dt_utc;
3725  TZ_DECODE_INFO tmp_zone_info;
3726 
3727  assert (src_dt != NULL);
3728  assert (src_zone_info_in != NULL);
3729  assert (dest_zone_info_in != NULL);
3730  assert (dest_dt != NULL);
3731 
3732  tmp_zone_info = *src_zone_info_in;
3733  if (src_zone_info_in->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET && src_zone_info_in->offset == 0)
3734  {
3735  /* the source is UTC */
3736  dt_utc = *src_dt;
3737  }
3738  else
3739  {
3740  /* convert to UTC */
3741  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (src_dt, &tmp_zone_info, false, false, &dt_utc);
3742  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3743  {
3744  goto exit;
3745  }
3746  }
3747 
3748  if (src_zone_info_out != NULL)
3749  {
3750  *src_zone_info_out = tmp_zone_info;
3751  }
3752 
3753  assert (TZ_IS_ZONE_VALID_DECODE_INFO (src_zone_info_in));
3754 
3755  if (src_zone_info_in->type == dest_zone_info_in->type
3756  && ((src_zone_info_in->type == TZ_REGION_ZONE
3757  && src_zone_info_in->zone.zone_id == dest_zone_info_in->zone.zone_id)
3758  || (src_zone_info_in->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET && src_zone_info_in->offset == dest_zone_info_in->offset)))
3759  {
3760  /* same zone, copy value and zone information */
3761  *dest_dt = *src_dt;
3762  if (dest_zone_info_out != NULL)
3763  {
3764  *dest_zone_info_out = tmp_zone_info;
3765  }
3766  return err_status;
3767  }
3768 
3769  tmp_zone_info = *dest_zone_info_in;
3770  if (dest_zone_info_in->type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET && dest_zone_info_in->offset == 0)
3771  {
3772  /* the destination is UTC */
3773  *dest_dt = dt_utc;
3774  }
3775  else
3776  {
3777  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&dt_utc, &tmp_zone_info, true, false, dest_dt);
3778  }
3779 
3780  if (dest_zone_info_out != NULL)
3781  {
3782  *dest_zone_info_out = tmp_zone_info;
3783  }
3784 
3785 exit:
3786  return err_status;
3787 }
3788 
3789 /*
3790  * tz_conv_tz_datetime_w_region () - Converts a source DATETIME from one timezone to another (uses region arguments)
3791  *
3792  * Return: error code
3793  * src_dt(in): object containing source datetime value;
3794  * src_tz_region(in): timezone region associated with source datetime
3795  * dest_tz_region(in): desired timezone region
3796  * dest_dt(out): destination datetime value
3797  * src_tz_id_out(out): compressed timezone identifier of the source
3798  * dest_tz_id_out(out): compressed timezone identifier of the destination
3799  */
3800 int
3801 tz_conv_tz_datetime_w_region (const DB_DATETIME * src_dt, const TZ_REGION * src_tz_region,
3802  const TZ_REGION * dest_tz_region, DB_DATETIME * dest_dt, TZ_ID * src_tz_id_out,
3803  TZ_ID * dest_tz_id_out)
3804 {
3805  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
3806  TZ_DECODE_INFO src_zone_info;
3807  TZ_DECODE_INFO dest_zone_info_in;
3808  TZ_DECODE_INFO src_zone_info_out = { TZ_REGION_OFFSET, {0} };
3809  TZ_DECODE_INFO dest_zone_info_out = { TZ_REGION_OFFSET, {0} };
3810 
3811  assert (src_dt != NULL);
3812  assert (src_tz_region != NULL);
3813  assert (dest_tz_region != NULL);
3814  assert (dest_dt != NULL);
3815 
3816  tz_decode_tz_region (src_tz_region, &src_zone_info);
3817  tz_decode_tz_region (dest_tz_region, &dest_zone_info_in);
3818 
3819  err_status =
3820  tz_conv_tz_datetime_w_zone_info (src_dt, &src_zone_info, &dest_zone_info_in, dest_dt, &src_zone_info_out,
3821  &dest_zone_info_out);
3822  if (src_tz_id_out != NULL)
3823  {
3824  tz_encode_tz_id (&src_zone_info_out, src_tz_id_out);
3825  }
3826 
3827  if (dest_tz_id_out != NULL)
3828  {
3829  tz_encode_tz_id (&dest_zone_info_out, dest_tz_id_out);
3830  }
3831 
3832  return err_status;
3833 }

3837  *

3840  * source_zone(in): source timezone string
3841  * len_source(in): length of source timezone string

3854  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3855  {
3856  return err_status;

3858

3860  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
3861  {
3862  return err_status;

3864

3868 /*
3869  * tz_explain_tz_id () - get timezone information
3870  *
3871  * Return: print characters
3872  * tz_id(in): complete valid zone identifier
3873  * tzr(out): buffer string for timezone region info
3874  * tzr_size(in): size of tz_str
3875  * tzdst(out): buffer string for daylight saving time info
3876  * tzdst_size (in) : size of tzdst
3877  * tzh(out): time zone hour offset
3878  * tzm(out): time zone minute offset
3879  * Return: error or no error
3880  */
3881 int
3882 tz_explain_tz_id (const TZ_ID * tz_id, char *tzr, const int tzr_size, char *tzdst, const int tzdst_size, int *tzh,
3883  int *tzm)
3884 {
3885 #define LEN_MIN_HOUR 6
3886 #define LEN_MIN_HOUR_SEC 9
3887  const TZ_DATA *tzd = tz_get_data ();
3888  int zone_name_size;
3889  int zone_id;
3890  int zone_offset_id;
3891  int dst_format_size;
3892  TZ_TIMEZONE *timezone;
3893  TZ_OFFSET_RULE *zone_off_rule;
3894  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
3895  char dst_format[TZ_MAX_FORMAT_SIZE];
3896  const char *p_dst_format = NULL;
3897  int total_offset = 0;
3898  int er_status = NO_ERROR;
3899 
3900  tz_decode_tz_id (tz_id, true, &tz_info);
3901  if (tz_info.type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
3902  {
3903  int offset = tz_info.offset;
3904  int hour, min, sec;
3905  char sign;
3906 
3907  if (tz_info.offset == TZ_INVALID_OFFSET)
3908  {
3909 #if !defined (CS_MODE)
3910  assert (BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ());
3911 #endif
3912  er_status = ER_TZ_INTERNAL_ERROR;
3913  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, er_status, 0);
3914  return er_status;
3915  }
3916 
3917  sign = (tz_info.offset < 0) ? '-' : '+';
3918 
3919  if (offset < TZ_MIN_OFFSET || offset > TZ_MAX_OFFSET)
3920  {
3921  er_status = ER_DATE_CONVERSION;
3922  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, er_status, 0);
3923  return er_status;
3924  }
3925 
3926  offset = (offset < 0) ? (-offset) : offset;
3927  db_time_decode ((DB_TIME *) (&offset), &hour, &min, &sec);
3928 
3929  *tzh = hour;
3930  *tzm = min;
3931  if (sign == '-')
3932  {
3933  *tzh = -(*tzh);
3934  *tzm = -(*tzm);
3935  }
3936 
3937  if (sec > 0)
3938  {
3939  sprintf (tzr, "%c%02d:%02d:%02d", sign, hour, min, sec);
3940  tzr[LEN_MIN_HOUR_SEC] = '\0';
3941  }
3942  else
3943  {
3944  sprintf (tzr, "%c%02d:%02d", sign, hour, min);
3945  tzr[LEN_MIN_HOUR] = '\0';
3946  }
3947  return er_status;
3948  }
3949 
3950  if (tzd == NULL)
3951  {
3952  er_status = ER_TZ_LOAD_ERROR;
3953  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, er_status, 1, "timezone lib not loaded");
3954  return er_status;
3955  }
3956 
3957  assert (tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule != NULL);
3958  total_offset = tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->gmt_off;
3959  if (tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID && tz_info.zone.p_ds_rule != NULL)
3960  {
3961  total_offset += tz_info.zone.p_ds_rule->save_time;
3962  }
3963  *tzh = total_offset / 3600;
3964  *tzm = (total_offset % 3600) / 60;
3965  zone_id = tz_info.zone.zone_id;
3966  zone_offset_id = tz_info.zone.offset_id;
3967  zone_name_size = strlen (tzd->names[zone_id].name);
3968 
3969  timezone = &(tzd->timezones[tzd->names[zone_id].zone_id]);
3970  zone_off_rule = &(tzd->offset_rules[timezone->gmt_off_rule_start + zone_offset_id]);
3971 
3972  p_dst_format = zone_off_rule->std_format;
3973  if (zone_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID)
3974  {
3975  TZ_DS_RULESET *ds_ruleset;
3976  TZ_DS_RULE *ds_rule;
3977  int dst_id = tz_info.zone.dst_id;
3978  const char *ds_abbr = NULL;
3979 
3980  ds_ruleset = &(tzd->ds_rulesets[zone_off_rule->ds_ruleset]);
3981  if (dst_id < ds_ruleset->count)
3982  {
3983  ds_rule = &(tzd->ds_rules[dst_id + ds_ruleset->index_start]);
3984  ds_abbr = ds_rule->letter_abbrev;
3985  }
3986 
3987  if (zone_off_rule->var_format != NULL)
3988  {
3989  if (ds_abbr == NULL)
3990  {
3991  p_dst_format = NULL;
3992  }
3993  else
3994  {
3995  snprintf (dst_format, sizeof (dst_format) - 1, zone_off_rule->var_format,
3996  (ds_abbr != NULL && *ds_abbr != '-') ? ds_abbr : "");
3997  p_dst_format = dst_format;
3998  }
3999  }
4000  else
4001  {
4002  if (ds_rule != NULL && ds_rule->save_time != 0 && zone_off_rule->save_format != NULL)
4003  {
4004  p_dst_format = zone_off_rule->save_format;
4005  }
4006  }
4007  }
4008 
4009  if (p_dst_format != NULL)
4010  {
4011  dst_format_size = strlen (p_dst_format);
4012  }
4013  else
4014  {
4015  dst_format_size = 0;
4016  }
4017 
4018  if (zone_name_size + 1 > tzr_size || dst_format_size + 1 > tzdst_size)
4019  {
4020  er_status = ER_FAILED;
4021  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, er_status, 0);
4022  return er_status;
4023  }
4024 
4025  if (p_dst_format != NULL)
4026  {
4027  snprintf (tzr, tzr_size, "%s", tzd->names[zone_id].name);
4028  snprintf (tzdst, tzdst_size, "%s", p_dst_format);
4029  tzdst[dst_format_size] = '\0';
4030  }
4031  else
4032  {
4033  snprintf (tzr, tzr_size, "%s", tzd->names[zone_id].name);
4034  }
4035 
4036  tzr[zone_name_size] = '\0';
4037 
4038  return er_status;
4039 #undef LEN_MIN_HOUR
4040 #undef LEN_MIN_HOUR_SEC
4041 }

4043 /*
4044  * tz_create_datetimetz_from_offset () - creates a datetime with timezone info from a timezone hour offset and a
4045  * a timezone minute offset
4046  *
4047  *
4048  * Return: error or no error
4049  * dt (in): local datetime value
4050  * tzh (in): timezone hour offset
4051  * tzm (in): timezone minute offset
4052  * dt_tz (out): object containing datetime value (adjusted to UTC) and
4053  * timezone info
4054  *
4055  */
4056 int
4057 tz_create_datetimetz_from_offset (const DB_DATETIME * dt, const int tzh, const int tzm, DB_DATETIMETZ * dt_tz)
4058 {
4059  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
4060  DB_DATETIME utc_dt;
4061  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
4062 
4063  tz_info.type = TZ_REGION_OFFSET;
4064  tz_info.offset = tzh * 3600 + tzm * 60;
4065 
4066  if (tz_info.offset < TZ_MIN_OFFSET || tz_info.offset > TZ_MAX_OFFSET)
4067  {
4068  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_DATE_CONVERSION, 0);
4069  err_status = ER_DATE_CONVERSION;
4070  return err_status;
4071  }
4072 
4073  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (dt, &tz_info, false, false, &utc_dt);
4074  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
4075  {
4076  return err_status;
4077  }
4078  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(dt_tz->tz_id));
4079  dt_tz->datetime = utc_dt;
4080  return err_status;
4081 }

4083 /*
4084  * tz_create_timestamptz_from_offset () - creates a timestamp with timezone info from a timezone hour and
4085  * a timezone minute offset
4086  *
4087  * Return: error code
4088  * date(in): local date value
4089  * time(in): local time value
4090  * tzh(in): timezone hour offset
4091  * tzm(in): timezone minute offset
4092  * timestamp_tz(out): object containing timestamp value (adjusted to UTC) and timezone info
4093  *
4094  */
4095 int
4096 tz_create_timestamptz_from_offset (const DB_DATE * date, const DB_TIME * time, const int tzh, const int tzm,
4097  DB_TIMESTAMPTZ * timestamp_tz)
4098 {
4099  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
4100  DB_DATETIME dt, utc_dt;
4101  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
4102  DB_DATE date_utc;
4103  DB_TIME time_utc;
4104 
4105  tz_info.type = TZ_REGION_OFFSET;
4106  tz_info.offset = tzh * 3600 + tzm * 60;
4107 
4108  if (tz_info.offset < TZ_MIN_OFFSET || tz_info.offset > TZ_MAX_OFFSET)
4109  {
4110  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_DATE_CONVERSION, 0);
4111  err_status = ER_DATE_CONVERSION;
4112  return err_status;
4113  }
4114 
4115  dt.date = *date;
4116  dt.time = (*time) * 1000;
4117 
4118  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&dt, &tz_info, false, false, &utc_dt);
4119  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
4120  {
4121  goto exit;
4122  }
4123  date_utc = utc_dt.date;
4124  time_utc = utc_dt.time / 1000;
4125

4127  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
4128  {
4129  goto exit;
4130  }
4131  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(timestamp_tz->tz_id));
4132 
4133 exit:
