4137 /*
4138  * tz_get_best_match_zone() - searches for the longest timezone matching the start of the string
4139  *
4140  * Returns: matched zone id (negative if not matched)
4141  * name(in): string (null terminated)
4142  * size(out): matched size
4143  *
4144  */
4145 int
4146 tz_get_best_match_zone (const char *name, int *size)
4147 {
4148  const TZ_DATA *tzd;
4149  int index_bot, index_top;
4150  int cmp_res;
4151 
4152  assert (name != NULL);
4153 
4154  tzd = tz_get_data ();
4155  if (tzd == NULL)
4156  {
4157  return -1;
4158  }
4159 
4160  index_bot = 0;
4161  index_top = tzd->name_count - 1;
4162 
4163  while (index_bot <= index_top)
4164  {
4165  int mid = index_bot + ((index_top - index_bot) >> 1);
4166  cmp_res = starts_with (tzd->names[mid].name, name);
4167 
4168  if (cmp_res <= 0)
4169  {
4170  index_bot = mid + 1;
4171  }
4172  else
4173  {
4174  index_top = mid - 1;
4175  }
4176  }
4177 
4178  if (index_bot == 0 || starts_with (tzd->names[index_bot - 1].name, name) != 0)
4179  {
4180  return -1;
4181  }
4182 
4183  *size = strlen (tzd->names[index_bot - 1].name);
4184  return index_bot - 1;
4185 }

4187 /*
4188  * tz_create_datetimetz_from_zoneid_and_tzd () - creates a datetime with timezone info from a datetime, a zone id
4189  * and daylight saving time info
4190  *
4191  *
4192  * Return: error or no error
4193  * dt(in): local datetime value
4194  * default_tz_region(in): default timezone region (used when zone_id is invalid)
4195  * zone_id(in): the zone id
4196  * tzd(in): daylight saving time info string
4197  * tzd_len(in): length of the tzd string
4198  * dt_tz(out): object containing datetime value(adjusted to UTC) and timezone info
4199  */
4200 int
4201 tz_create_datetimetz_from_zoneid_and_tzd (const DB_DATETIME * dt, TZ_REGION * default_tz_region, const int zone_id,
4202  const char *tzd, const int tzd_len, bool is_time_tz, DB_DATETIMETZ * dt_tz)
4203 {
4204  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
4205  DB_DATETIME utc_dt;
4206  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
4207  int offset = 0;
4208 
4209  if (zone_id != -1)
4210  {
4211  tz_info.type = TZ_REGION_ZONE;
4212  tz_info.zone.zone_id = zone_id;
4213  tz_info.zone.dst_id = TZ_DS_ID_MAX;
4214  tz_info.zone.offset_id = TZ_OFFSET_ID_MAX;
4215  }
4216  else
4217  {
4218  tz_decode_tz_region (default_tz_region, &tz_info);
4219  }
4220 
4221  if (tzd != NULL)
4222  {
4223  if (tzd_len + 1 > (int) sizeof (tz_info.zone.dst_str))
4224  {
4225  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_TZ_INVALID_DST, 0);
4226  return ER_TZ_INVALID_DST;
4227  }
4228  strncpy (tz_info.zone.dst_str, tzd, tzd_len);
4229  tz_info.zone.dst_str[tzd_len] = '\0';
4230  }
4231  else
4232  {
4233  tz_info.zone.dst_str[0] = '\0';
4234  }
4235 
4236  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (dt, &tz_info, false, false, &utc_dt);
4237  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
4238  {
4239  return err_status;
4240  }
4241 
4242  if (is_time_tz == true)
4243  {
4244  offset = (int) (dt->date - utc_dt.date) * 3600 * 24 + (int) (dt->time - utc_dt.time) / 1000;
4245  tz_info.type = TZ_REGION_OFFSET;
4246  tz_info.offset = offset;
4247  }
4248 
4249  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(dt_tz->tz_id));
4250  dt_tz->datetime = utc_dt;
4251 
4252  return err_status;
4253 }

4255 /*
4256  * tz_create_timestamptz_from_zoneid_and_tzd () - creates a timestamp with timezone info from a datetime, a zone id
4257  * and daylight saving time info
4258  *
4259  * Return: error or no error
4260  * date(in): local date value
4261  * time(in): local time value
4262  * default_tz_region(in): default timezone region (used when zone_id is invalid)
4263  * zone_id(in): the zone id
4264  * tzd(in): daylight saving time info string
4265  * tzd_len(in): length of the tzd string
4266  * timestamp_tz(out): object containing timestamp value(adjusted to UTC) and timezone info
4267  */
4268 int
4269 tz_create_timestamptz_from_zoneid_and_tzd (const DB_DATE * date, const DB_TIME * time, TZ_REGION * default_tz_region,
4270  const int zone_id, const char *tzd, const int tzd_len,
4271  DB_TIMESTAMPTZ * timestamp_tz)
4272 {
4273  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
4274  DB_DATETIME utc_dt, dt;
4275  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
4276  DB_DATE date_utc;
4277  DB_TIME time_utc;
4278 
4279  if (zone_id != -1)
4280  {
4281  tz_info.type = TZ_REGION_ZONE;
4282  tz_info.zone.zone_id = zone_id;
4283  tz_info.zone.dst_id = TZ_DS_ID_MAX;
4284  tz_info.zone.offset_id = TZ_OFFSET_ID_MAX;
4285  }
4286  else
4287  {
4288  tz_decode_tz_region (default_tz_region, &tz_info);
4289  }
4290 
4291  if (tzd != NULL)
4292  {
4293  if (tzd_len + 1 > (int) sizeof (tz_info.zone.dst_str))
4294  {
4295  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_TZ_INVALID_DST, 0);
4296  return ER_TZ_INVALID_DST;
4297  }
4298  strncpy (tz_info.zone.dst_str, tzd, tzd_len);
4299  tz_info.zone.dst_str[tzd_len] = '\0';
4300  }
4301  else
4302  {
4303  tz_info.zone.dst_str[0] = '\0';
4304  }
4305 
4306  dt.date = *date;
4307  dt.time = *(time) * 1000;
4308  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&dt, &tz_info, false, false, &utc_dt);
4309 
4310  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
4311  {
4312  return err_status;
4313  }
4314 
4315  date_utc = utc_dt.date;
4316  time_utc = utc_dt.time / 1000;
4317  err_status = db_timestamp_encode_utc (&date_utc, &time_utc, &(timestamp_tz->timestamp));
4318  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
4319  {
4320  return err_status;
4321  }
4322 
4323  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(timestamp_tz->tz_id));
4324  return err_status;
4325 }

4327 /*
4328  * starts_with() - verifies if prefix is a prefix of str
4329  * otherwise, verifies if prefix is lexicographically greater or smaller than str
4330  * Return 0 if prefix is a prefix of str
4331  * Return > 0 if prefix is lexicographically greater than str
4332  * Return < 0 if prefix is lexicographically smaller than str
4333  * prefix(in): the prefix string
4334  * str(in): the string to search for the prefix
4335  *
4336  */
4337 static int
4338 starts_with (const char *prefix, const char *str)
4339 {
4340  while (*prefix != '\0' && (*prefix) == (*str))
4341  {
4342  prefix++, str++;
4343  }
4344  if (*prefix == '\0')
4345  {
4346  return 0;
4347  }
4348 
4349  return *(const unsigned char *) prefix - *(const unsigned char *) str;
4350 }

4352 #if defined(LINUX)
4353 /*
4354  * find_timezone_from_clock() - Tries to put in timezone_name the local timezone taken from /etc/sysconfig/clock
4355  * Return >= 0 if no error
4356  * Return < 0 if error
4357  * timezone_name(out): the local timezone
4358  * buf_len(in): number of elements in the buffer without the null ending
4359  * character
4360  */
4361 static int
4362 find_timezone_from_clock (char *timezone_name, int buf_len)
4363 {
4364 #define MAX_LINE_SIZE 256
4365  int cnt = 0;
4366  FILE *fp;
4367  char str[MAX_LINE_SIZE + 1];
4368  char *zone = NULL;
4369 
4370  fp = fopen ("/etc/sysconfig/clock", "r");
4371  if (fp == NULL)
4372  {
4373  return -1;
4374  }
4375 
4376  while (fgets (str, MAX_LINE_SIZE + 1, fp) != NULL)
4377  {
4378  if (*str == '#')
4379  {
4380  continue;
4381  }
4382  if (cnt == 0)
4383  {
4384  zone = strstr (str, "ZONE");
4385  if (zone != NULL)
4386  {
4387  zone += 4;
4388  while (*zone == ' ')
4389  {
4390  zone++;
4391  }
4392 
4393  if (*zone != '=')
4394  {
4395  goto error;
4396  }
4397 
4398  zone++;
4399  while (*zone == ' ')
4400  {
4401  zone++;
4402  }
4403 
4404  if (*zone != '"')
4405  {
4406  goto error;
4407  }
4408 
4409  zone++;
4410  while (*zone != '"' && *zone != '\0')
4411  {
4412  timezone_name[cnt++] = *zone;
4413  zone++;
4414  if (cnt > buf_len)
4415  {
4416  goto error;
4417  }
4418  }
4419  if (*zone == '"')
4420  {
4421  break;
4422  }
4423  }
4424  }
4425  else
4426  {
4427  zone = str;
4428  while (*zone != '"' && *zone != '\0')
4429  {
4430  timezone_name[cnt++] = *zone;
4431  zone++;
4432  if (cnt > buf_len)
4433  {
4434  goto error;
4435  }
4436  }
4437  break;
4438  }
4439  }
4440 
4441  timezone_name[cnt] = '\0';
4442  fclose (fp);
4443  return 0;
4444 
4445 error:
4446  fclose (fp);
4447  return -1;
4448 #undef MAX_LINE_SIZE
4449 }

4451 /*
4452  * find_timezone_from_localtime() - Tries to put in timezona_name the local timezone taken from /etc/localtime
4453  * Return >= 0 if no error
4454  * Return < 0 if error
4455  * timezone_name(out): the local timezone
4456  * buf_len(in): number of elements in the buffer without the null ending
4457  * character
4458  */
4459 static int
4460 find_timezone_from_localtime (char *timezone_name, int buf_len)
4461 {
4462  char linkname[PATH_MAX + 1];
4463  char *p;
4464  const char *zone_info = "zoneinfo";
4465  bool start = false;
4466  ssize_t r;
4467  int cnt = 0;
4468 
4469  memset (linkname, 0, sizeof (linkname));
4470  r = readlink ("/etc/localtime", linkname, PATH_MAX + 1);
4471  if (r < 0)
4472  {
4473  return r;
4474  }
4475 
4476  if (r > PATH_MAX)
4477  {
4478  return -1;
4479  }
4480 
4481  p = strtok (linkname, "/");
4482  while (p != NULL)
4483  {
4484  if (!start)
4485  {
4486  if (strcmp (p, zone_info) == 0)
4487  {
4488  start = true;
4489  }
4490  }
4491  else
4492  {
4493  while (*p != '\0')
4494  {
4495  if (cnt > buf_len)
4496  {
4497  goto error;
4498  }
4499  timezone_name[cnt++] = *p;
4500  p++;
4501  }
4502  if (cnt > buf_len)
4503  {
4504  goto error;
4505  }
4506  timezone_name[cnt++] = '/';
4507  }
4508  p = strtok (NULL, "/");
4509  }
4510 
4511  timezone_name[cnt - 1] = '\0';
4512  return 0;
4513 
4514 error:
4515  return -1;
4516 }
4517 #endif

4519 #if defined(WINDOWS)
4520 /*
4521  * tz_get_iana_zone_id_by_windows_zone() - returns the ID of the leftmost timezone corresponding to the specified
4522  * windows zone name
4523  *
4524  * Returns: ID of zone, or -1 if not found
4525  * windows_zone_name(in): windows zone name to search for (null-terminated)
4526  */
4527 static int
4528 tz_get_iana_zone_id_by_windows_zone (const char *windows_zone_name)
4529 {
4530  const TZ_DATA *tzd;
4531  int mid = 0;
4532  int index_bot, index_top;
4533  int cmp_res;
4534 
4535  assert (windows_zone_name != NULL);
4536 
4537  tzd = tz_get_data ();
4538  if (tzd == NULL)
4539  {
4540  return -1;
4541  }
4542 
4543  index_bot = 0;
4544  index_top = tzd->windows_iana_map_count - 1;
4545 
4546  while (index_bot <= index_top)
4547  {
4548  mid = index_bot + ((index_top - index_bot) >> 1);
4549  cmp_res = strcmp (windows_zone_name, tzd->windows_iana_map[mid].windows_zone);
4550 
4551  if (cmp_res <= 0)
4552  {
4553  index_top = mid - 1;
4554  }
4555  else
4556  {
4557  index_bot = mid + 1;
4558  }
4559  }
4560 
4561  if (strcmp (tzd->windows_iana_map[index_bot].windows_zone, windows_zone_name) != 0)
4562  {
4563  return -1;
4564  }
4565  return tzd->windows_iana_map[index_bot].iana_zone_id;
4566 }
4567 #endif

4569 /*
4570  * resolve_timezone() - Puts in timezone the local timezone
4571  * Return >= 0 if no error
4572  * Return < 0 if error
4573  * timezone(out): the local timezone
4574  * buf_len(in): number of elements in the buffer without the null ending character
4575  */
4576 int
4577 tz_resolve_os_timezone (char *timezone, int buf_len)
4578 {
4579 #if defined (WINDOWS)
4580  const TZ_DATA *tz_data;
4581  int len_iana_zone, iana_zone_id;
4582  char tzname[64];
4583  size_t tzret;
4584 
4585  tz_data = tz_get_data ();
4586  tzset ();
4587  _get_tzname (&tzret, tzname, sizeof (tzname), 0);
4588  iana_zone_id = tz_get_iana_zone_id_by_windows_zone (tzname);
4589  if (iana_zone_id < 0)
4590  {
4591  return iana_zone_id;
4592  }
4593  len_iana_zone = strlen (tz_data->timezone_names[iana_zone_id]);
4594  if (buf_len < len_iana_zone)
4595  {
4596  return -1;
4597  }
4598  memmove (timezone, tz_data->timezone_names[iana_zone_id], len_iana_zone);
4599  timezone[len_iana_zone] = '\0';
4600  return 0;
4601 #elif defined(AIX)
4602  char *env = NULL;
4603  int ret = 0;
4604 
4605  env = getenv ("TZ");
4606  if (env == NULL)
4607  {
4608  return -1;
4609  }
4610  else
4611  {
4612  strncpy (timezone, env, buf_len);
4613  timezone[buf_len] = '\0';
4614  }
4615  ret = tz_get_zone_id_by_name (timezone, strlen (timezone));
4616  return ret;
4617 #else
4618  int ret = 0;
4619 
4620  ret = find_timezone_from_clock (timezone, buf_len);
4621  if (ret < 0)
4622  {
4623  ret = find_timezone_from_localtime (timezone, buf_len);
4624  }
4625  if (ret >= 0)
4626  {
4627  ret = tz_get_zone_id_by_name (timezone, strlen (timezone));
4628  }
4629  return ret;
4630 #endif
4631 }

4754 /*
4755  * tz_full_timezones_start_scan() - start scan function for 'SHOW FULL TIMEZONES'
4756  * return: NO_ERROR, or ER_code
4757  * thread_p(in): thread entry
4758  * show_type(in):
4759  * arg_values(in):
4760  * arg_cnt(in):
4761  * ptr(in/out): 'show timezones' context
4762  */
4763 int
4764 tz_full_timezones_start_scan (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int show_type, DB_VALUE ** arg_values, int arg_cnt, void **ptr)
4765 {
4766  int error = NO_ERROR;
4767  SHOWSTMT_ARRAY_CONTEXT *ctx = NULL;
4768  DB_VALUE *vals = NULL;
4769  const int col_num = 4;
4770  const TZ_DATA *tzd;
4771  int i;
4772  time_t cur_time;
4773  DB_DATETIME utc_datetime, dummy_datetime;
4774  int year, month, day, hour, minute, second;
4775  TZ_DECODE_INFO tzinfo;
4776  TZ_TIMEZONE timezone;
4777  TZ_OFFSET_RULE zone_off_rule;
4778  char dst_format[TZ_MAX_FORMAT_SIZE];
4779  const char *dst_name = NULL;
4780  char gmt_offset[MAX_LEN_OFFSET];
4781  char dst_offset[MAX_LEN_OFFSET];
4782  char empty_string[1];
4783 
4784  empty_string[0] = '\0';
4785  tzd = tz_get_data ();
4786  if (tzd == NULL)
4787  {
4788  /* no timezones, just return */
4789  return error;
4790  }
4791 
4792  *ptr = NULL;
4793 
4794  ctx = showstmt_alloc_array_context (thread_p, tzd->name_count, col_num);
4795  if (ctx == NULL)
4796  {
4797  error = er_errid ();
4798  return error;
4799  }
4800 
4801  /* Get the current time in seconds */
4802  time (&cur_time);
4803  tz_timestamp_decode_no_leap_sec ((int) cur_time, &year, &month, &day, &hour, &minute, &second);
4804 
4805  error = db_datetime_encode (&utc_datetime, month + 1, day, year, hour, minute, second, 0);
4806  if (error != NO_ERROR)
4807  {
4808  goto exit_on_error;
4809  }
4810 
4811  for (i = 0; i < tzd->name_count; i++)
4812  {
4813  int idx = 0;
4814  int dst_save_time = 0;
4815  int zone_id;
4816 
4817  vals = showstmt_alloc_tuple_in_context (thread_p, ctx);
4818  if (vals == NULL)
4819  {
4820  error = er_errid ();
4821  goto exit_on_error;
4822  }
4823  /* Geographic timezone name */
4824  db_make_string_by_const_str (&vals[idx++], tzd->names[i].name);
4825 
4826  /* First get the zone id */
4827  zone_id = i;
4828 
4829  tzinfo.type = TZ_REGION_ZONE;
4830  tzinfo.zone.zone_id = zone_id;
4831  tzinfo.zone.dst_str[0] = '\0';
4832 
4833  error = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&utc_datetime, &tzinfo, true, true, &dummy_datetime);
4834  if (error != NO_ERROR)
4835  {
4836  goto exit_on_error;
4837  }
4838 
4839  timezone = tzd->timezones[tzd->names[i].zone_id];
4840  zone_off_rule = tzd->offset_rules[timezone.gmt_off_rule_start + tzinfo.zone.offset_id];
4841 
4842  /* Timezone offset */
4843  tz_print_tz_offset (gmt_offset, zone_off_rule.gmt_off);
4844  db_make_string_copy (&vals[idx++], gmt_offset);
4845 
4846  dst_name = zone_off_rule.std_format;
4847  if (zone_off_rule.ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID)
4848  {
4849  TZ_DS_RULESET ds_ruleset;
4850  TZ_DS_RULE ds_rule;
4851  int dst_id;
4852  const char *ds_abbr = NULL;
4853 
4854  ds_ruleset = tzd->ds_rulesets[zone_off_rule.ds_ruleset];
4855  dst_id = tzinfo.zone.dst_id;
4856 
4857  if (dst_id != TZ_DS_ID_MAX)
4858  {
4859  ds_rule = tzd->ds_rules[dst_id + ds_ruleset.index_start];
4860  dst_save_time = ds_rule.save_time;
4861  ds_abbr = ds_rule.letter_abbrev;
4862 
4863  if (zone_off_rule.var_format != NULL)
4864  {
4865  snprintf (dst_format, sizeof (dst_format) - 1, zone_off_rule.var_format,
4866  (ds_abbr != NULL && *ds_abbr != '-') ? ds_abbr : "");
4867  dst_name = dst_format;
4868  }
4869  else
4870  {
4871  if (dst_save_time != 0)
4872  {
4873  dst_name = zone_off_rule.save_format;
4874  }
4875  }
4876  if (dst_name == NULL)
4877  {
4878  dst_name = empty_string;
4879  }
4880  }
4881  }
4882 
4883  /* Now put the daylight saving time offset and name */
4884  if (dst_name != NULL)
4885  {
4886  tz_print_tz_offset (dst_offset, dst_save_time);
4887  db_make_string_copy (&vals[idx++], dst_offset);
4888  db_make_string_copy (&vals[idx++], dst_name);
4889  }
4890  else
4891  {
4892  db_make_null (&vals[idx++]);
4893  db_make_null (&vals[idx++]);
4894  }
4895  }
4896 
4897  *ptr = ctx;
4898  return NO_ERROR;
4899 
4900 exit_on_error:
4901  if (ctx != NULL)
4902  {
4903  showstmt_free_array_context (thread_p, ctx);
4904  }
4905 
4906  return error;
4907 }
4908 #endif

5014 /*

5017  * Returns : error code
5018  * client_checksum(in): client checksum
5019  * server_checksum(in): server checksum
5020  * client_text(in): text to display in message error for client(this can be "server" when checking server vs database)
5021  * server_text(in): text to display in message error for server(this can be "database" when checking server vs database)
5022  */
5023 int
5024 check_timezone_compat (const char *client_checksum, const char *server_checksum, const char *client_text,
5025  const char *server_text)

5028  assert (server_checksum != NULL);

5031 
5032  if (strcmp (client_checksum, server_checksum) != 0)
5033  {
5034  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_TZ_INCOMPATIBLE_TIMEZONE_LIBRARIES, 2, client_text, server_text);
5035  return ER_TZ_INCOMPATIBLE_TIMEZONE_LIBRARIES;
5036  }
5037 
5038  return NO_ERROR;

5041 /*
5042  * tz_tzid_convert_region_to_offset - if the timezone encoded in tz_id is of region type the function converts
5043  * it to an offset type
5044  *
5045  * Returns :
5046  * tz_id(in): timezone id
5047  */
5048 void
5049 tz_tzid_convert_region_to_offset (TZ_ID * tz_id)
5050 {
5051  unsigned int flag;
5052 
5053  flag = ((*tz_id) & TZ_MASK_TZ_ID_FLAG) >> TZ_BIT_SHIFT_TZ_ID_FLAG;
5054 
5055  if (flag == 0)
5056  {
5057  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
5058  int total_offset;
5059 
5060  tz_decode_tz_id (tz_id, true, &tz_info);
5061  assert (tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule != NULL);
5062  total_offset = tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->gmt_off;
5063 
5064  if (tz_info.zone.p_zone_off_rule->ds_type == DS_TYPE_RULESET_ID && tz_info.zone.p_ds_rule != NULL)
5065  {
5066  total_offset += tz_info.zone.p_ds_rule->save_time;
5067  }
5068 
5069  tz_info.type = TZ_REGION_OFFSET;
5070  tz_info.offset = total_offset;
5071  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, tz_id);
5072  }
5073 }

5150 /*

5179 /*
5180  * conv_tz() - Converts a tz type from one time library to another
5181  *
5182  * Returns error or no error
5183  * p_out (out): pointer to output timezone data type
5184  * p_in (in): pointer to input timezone data type
5185  * type (in): timezone type
5186  *
5187  * NOTE: It does not make sense to use the function as NON-SA_MODE.
5188  */
5189 int
5190 conv_tz (void *p_out, const void *p_in, DB_TYPE type)
5191 {
5192  int err_status = NO_ERROR;
5193  TZ_DATA save_data;
5194 
5195  /* Save the state */
5196  save_data = tz_Timezone_data;
5197  switch (type)
5198  {
5199  case DB_TYPE_TIMESTAMPTZ:
5200  {
5201  DB_TIMESTAMPTZ *current, *to_be;
5202  DB_DATE date_local;
5203  DB_TIME time_local;
5204  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
5205  DB_DATETIME src_dt, dest_dt;
5206  DB_TIMESTAMP timestamp_utc;
5207 
5208  current = (DB_TIMESTAMPTZ *) p_in;
5209  to_be = (DB_TIMESTAMPTZ *) p_out;
5210 
5211  tz_decode_tz_id (&(current->tz_id), true, &tz_info);
5212  if (tz_info.type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
5213  {
5214  *to_be = *current;
5215  return NO_ERROR;
5216  }
5217 
5218 #if defined (SA_MODE)
5219  if (tz_Is_backward_compatible_timezone[tz_info.zone.zone_id] == true)
5220  {
5221  err_status = set_new_zone_id (&tz_info);
5222  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5223  {
5224  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
5225  goto exit;
5226  }
5227  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(to_be->tz_id));
5228  to_be->timestamp = current->timestamp;
5229  goto exit;
5230  }
5231 #else /* !SA_MODE */
5232  /* NON SA_MODE have no interest. */
5233 #endif /* !SA_MODE */
5234 
5235  err_status = db_timestamp_decode_w_tz_id (&(current->timestamp), &(current->tz_id), &date_local, &time_local);
5236  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5237  {
5238  goto exit;
5239  }
5240 
5241  src_dt.date = date_local;
5242  src_dt.time = time_local * 1000;
5243 
5244  err_status = set_new_zone_id (&tz_info);
5245  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5246  {
5247  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
5248  goto exit;
5249  }
5250 
5251  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&src_dt, &tz_info, false, false, &dest_dt);
5252  /* If we get an error it means that the abbreviation does no longer exist
5253  * Then we must try to convert without the abbreviation
5254  */
5255  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5256  {
5257  tz_info.zone.dst_str[0] = '\0';
5258  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&src_dt, &tz_info, false, false, &dest_dt);
5259  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5260  {
5261  goto exit;
5262  }
5263  }
5264 
5265  dest_dt.time /= 1000;
5266  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(to_be->tz_id));
5267  /* Encode UTC time for timestamptz */
5268  db_timestamp_encode_utc (&dest_dt.date, &dest_dt.time, &timestamp_utc);
5269  to_be->timestamp = timestamp_utc;
5270  }
5271  break;
5272 
5273  case DB_TYPE_DATETIMETZ:
5274  {
5275  DB_DATETIMETZ *current, *to_be;
5276  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
5277  DB_DATETIME dest_dt;
5278  DB_DATETIME datetime_local;
5279 
5280  current = (DB_DATETIMETZ *) p_in;
5281  to_be = (DB_DATETIMETZ *) p_out;
5282 
5283  tz_decode_tz_id (&(current->tz_id), true, &tz_info);
5284  if (tz_info.type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET)
5285  {
5286  *to_be = *current;
5287  return NO_ERROR;
5288  }
5289 
5290 #if defined (SA_MODE)
5291  if (tz_Is_backward_compatible_timezone[tz_info.zone.zone_id] == true)
5292  {
5293  err_status = set_new_zone_id (&tz_info);
5294  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5295  {
5296  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
5297  goto exit;
5298  }
5299  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(to_be->tz_id));
5300  to_be->datetime = current->datetime;
5301  goto exit;
5302  }
5303 #else /* !SA_MODE */
5304  /* NON SA_MODE have no interest. */
5305 #endif /* !SA_MODE */
5306 
5307  err_status = tz_utc_datetimetz_to_local (&(current->datetime), &(current->tz_id), &datetime_local);
5308  if (err_status)
5309  {
5310  goto exit;
5311  }
5312 
5313  err_status = set_new_zone_id (&tz_info);
5314  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5315  {
5316  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
5317  goto exit;
5318  }
5319 
5320  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&datetime_local, &tz_info, false, false, &dest_dt);
5321  /* If we get an error it means that the abbreviation does no longer exist
5322  * then we must try to convert without the abbreviation
5323  */
5324  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5325  {
5326  tz_info.zone.dst_str[0] = '\0';
5327  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&datetime_local, &tz_info, false, false, &dest_dt);
5328  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5329  {
5330  goto exit;
5331  }
5332  }
5333 
5334  tz_encode_tz_id (&tz_info, &(to_be->tz_id));
5335  to_be->datetime = dest_dt;
5336  }
5337  break;
5338 
5339  case DB_TYPE_TIMESTAMPLTZ:
5340  {
5341  DB_TIMESTAMP *current, *to_be;
5342  TZ_ID ses_tz_id;
5343  DB_DATE date_local;
5344  DB_TIME time_local;
5345  DB_DATETIME src_dt, dest_dt;
5346  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
5347 
5348  current = (DB_TIMESTAMP *) p_in;
5349  to_be = (DB_TIMESTAMP *) p_out;
5350 
5351  err_status = tz_create_session_tzid_for_timestamp (current, &ses_tz_id);
5352  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5353  {
5354  goto exit;
5355  }
5356 
5357  tz_decode_tz_id (&ses_tz_id, true, &tz_info);
5358 
5359 #if defined (SA_MODE)
5360  if ((tz_info.type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET) || (tz_Is_backward_compatible_timezone[tz_info.zone.zone_id] == true))
5361  {
5362  *to_be = *current;
5363  return NO_ERROR;
5364  }
5365 #else /* !SA_MODE */
5366  /* NON SA_MODE have no interest. */
5367 #endif /* !SA_MODE */
5368 
5369  err_status = db_timestamp_decode_w_tz_id (current, &ses_tz_id, &date_local, &time_local);
5370  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5371  {
5372  goto exit;
5373  }
5374 
5375  src_dt.date = date_local;
5376  src_dt.time = time_local * 1000;
5377 
5378  err_status = set_new_zone_id (&tz_info);
5379  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5380  {
5381  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, err_status, 0);
5382  goto exit;
5383  }
5384 
5385  err_status = tz_datetime_utc_conv (&src_dt, &tz_info, false, false, &dest_dt);
5386  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5387  {
5388  goto exit;
5389  }
5390 
5391  dest_dt.time /= 1000;
5392  db_timestamp_encode_utc (&dest_dt.date, &dest_dt.time, to_be);
5393  }
5394  break;
5395 
5396  case DB_TYPE_DATETIMELTZ:
5397  {
5398  DB_DATETIME *current, *to_be;
5399  TZ_ID ses_tz_id;
5400  TZ_DECODE_INFO tz_info;
5401  DB_DATETIME datetime_local;
5402 
5403  current = (DB_DATETIME *) p_in;
5404  to_be = (DB_DATETIME *) p_out;
5405 
5406  err_status = tz_create_session_tzid_for_datetime (current, true, &ses_tz_id);
5407  if (err_status != NO_ERROR)
5408  {
5409  goto exit;
5410  }
5411 
5412  tz_decode_tz_id (&ses_tz_id, true, &tz_info);
5413 
5414 #if defined (SA_MODE)
5415  if ((tz_info.type == TZ_REGION_OFFSET) || (tz_Is_backward_compatible_timezone[tz_info.zone.zone_id] == true))
5416  {
5417  *to_be = *current;
5418  return NO_ERROR;
5419  }
5420 #else /* !SA_MODE */
5421  /* NON SA_MODE have no interest. */
5422 #endif /* !SA_MODE */
5423 
5424  err_status = tz_utc_datetimetz_to_local (current, &ses_tz_id, &datetime_local);
5425  if (err_status)

5441  }
5442  }

5444 
5445  default:

5448  }
